S06psp_2-3u:1_0: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahārājānas te sarve 'nekair devaputrasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ tatraiva pariṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan,
S06psp_2-3u:1_1_0: evaṃ śakro devānām indro yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmapārṣadyā
S06psp_2-3u:1_1_1: yāvan mahābrahmāṇo ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau parīttābhā yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikāś
S06psp_2-3u:1_1_2: ca devaputrā anekaiḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:1_2: yaś ca teṣāṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:1_3: kāyāvabhāsaḥ, yaś ca trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ karmavipākajaḥ kāyāvabhāsaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:1_4_0: sa tathāgataprakṛtiprabhāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm
S06psp_2-3u:1_4_1: api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam
S06psp_2-3u:1_5: na kṣamate tathāgataprabhāyāḥ purataḥ sā devānāṃ prabhā.
S06psp_2-3u:1_6: tathāgataprabhaivāgrākhyate jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā varā pravarā praṇītā anuttarā niruttarā uttarottarā cākhyāyate.
S06psp_2-3u:1_7: tadyathāpi nāma jambūnadasya suvarṇasya purataḥ kṛṣṇalauhaṃ na bhrājate na tapati na virocate,
S06psp_2-3u:1_8: evam eva tathāgatasya prakṛtiprabhāyāḥ purataḥ sā devānāṃ karmavipākajaprabhā na bhrājate na tapati na virocate.
S06psp_2-3u:1_9: tathāgataprabhaiva teṣām agrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhā varā pravarā (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:2_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:2_1_0: ete bhadanta subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ye cāturmahārājakāyikā devās
S06psp_2-3u:2_1_1: trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikā
S06psp_2-3u:2_1_2: devaputrās te sarve saṃnipatitā āyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaśravaṇāya
S06psp_2-3u:2_2: kathaṃ ca bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam? katamā ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā? iti yogyatā
S06psp_2-3u:3_0: evam ukte, āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:3_1: tena hi kauśika upadekṣyāmi buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:3_2: yaiś ca devaputrair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ notpāditaṃ tair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayitavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:3_3: ye punar avakrāntaniyāmās te 'pratibalā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayituṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:3_4: tat kasya hetor? baddhasīmāno hi te saṃsārasrotasaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:4_0: api tu khalu punas teṣām apy anumode te ced anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayeyuḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:7_0: tatra kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya katamā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:7_1_0: iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ rūpam anityato
S06psp_2-3u:7_1_1: manasikaroti duḥkhato 'nātmataḥ śāntato rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghataḥ parataḥ pralopadharmataś
S06psp_2-3u:7_1_2: calataḥ prabhaṅgurato bhayata upasargata upadravato manasikaroti tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06psp_2-3u:7_3: evaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:7_4: evaṃ pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātum anityato manasikaroti duḥkhato (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:7_5_0: 3) 'nātmataḥ śāntato rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghataḥ parataḥ pralopadharmataś calataḥ
S06psp_2-3u:7_5_1: prabhaṅgurato bhayata upasargata upadravato manasikaroti tac cānupalambhayogena sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktena
S06psp_2-3u:7_6_0: evam avidyāpratyayān saṃskārān anityato manasikaroti duḥkhato 'nātmataḥ śāntato rogato
S06psp_2-3u:7_6_1: gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghataḥ parataḥ pralopadharmataś calataḥ prabhaṅgurato bhayata upasargata
S06psp_2-3u:7_6_2: upadravataḥ saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ nāmarūpapratyayaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:7_6_3: ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayā vedanā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā
S06psp_2-3u:7_6_4: tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam upādānapratyayo bhavo bhavapratyayā jātir jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:7_7_0: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati tac cānityato duḥkhato
S06psp_2-3u:7_7_1: 'nātmataḥ śāntato rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghataḥ parataḥ pralopadharmataś calataḥ
S06psp_2-3u:7_7_2: prabhaṅgurato bhayata upasargata upadravato manasikaroti tac cānupalambhayogena sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktena

S06psp_2-3u:7_8_3: sparśanirodhād vedanānirodho vedanānirodhāt tṛṣṇānirodhas tṛṣṇānirodhād upādānanirodha
S06psp_2-3u:7_9_0: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati tac ca nirātmataḥ śāntato
S06psp_2-3u:8_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati tac cānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:8_1_0: evaṃ catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catura ṛddhipādān pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni
S06psp_2-3u:8_1_1: āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīr daśa
S06psp_2-3u:8_2: 4) buddhadharmān bhāvayati sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac cānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:9_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittotpādena dānapāramitāṃ carati tac cānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:9_1: evaṃ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś cittotpādaiḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati tac cānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:10_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃdharmeṇa dharmān yojayati.
S06psp_2-3u:10_1: evaṃdharmeṇa dharmān abhiṣyandayan pariṣyandayan paripūrayan parisphāran pratyavekṣate nirātmakā hy ete sarvadharmā ātmātmīyavigatāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:10_2_0: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi yad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlacittaṃ tad bodhicittenāsamavahitaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:10_2_1: yat pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad bodhicittakuśalamūlacittābhyām asamavahitaṃ yad bodhicittaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:10_3: tat kasya hetor? yat kauśika bodhicittaṃ tat pariṇāmanācitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_2-3u:10_4: yat pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad bodhicitte na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06psp_2-3u:10_5: iyaṃ kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā yad evaṃ sarvadharmāṃś ca pratyavekṣate na ca kaṃcid dharmam abhiniviśate nopalabhate.
S06psp_2-3u:11_0: evam ukte śakro devānām indraḥ sthaviraṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:11_1_0: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte pariṇāmanācittaṃ bodhicittenāsamavahitaṃ? kathaṃ bodheś cittaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:11_1_1: pariṇāmanācittenāsamavahitaṃ? kathaṃ vā pariṇāmanācitte bodhicittaṃ na saṃvidyate
S06psp_2-3u:11_1_2: nopalabhyate? kathaṃ bodhicitte pariṇāmanācittaṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate?
S06psp_2-3u:12_0: subhūtir āha : yat kauśika pariṇāmanācittaṃ tad acittaṃ yad bodhicittaṃ tad acittaṃ na hy acittatācittatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati.
S06psp_2-3u:12_1: iti hi yad acittaṃ tad acintyaṃ yad acintyaṃ tad acittam acittatācittatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati.
S06psp_2-3u:14_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:14_1: sādhu sādhu (PSP_2-3:5) subhūte sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ subhūte yas tvaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadiśasi,
S06psp_2-3u:15_0: subhūtir āha: kṛtajñena mayā bhagavan bhavitavyaṃ nākṛtajñena,
S06psp_2-3u:15_1_0: tathā hi bhagavan pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:15_1_1: samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike taiḥ śrāvakaiḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv avavadito 'nuśiṣṭaḥ saṃdarśitaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:15_1_2: samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpito yato bhagavān bodhisattvabhūtaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:15_2: evam eva bhagavann asmābhir api bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv avavaditavyā anuśāsitavyāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:15_3_1: pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā asmābhir api bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avavaditā anuśiṣṭāḥ saṃdarśitāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:15_3_2: samuttejjitāḥ saṃpraharṣitāḥ samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_2-3u:16_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:16_1_0: tena hi kauśika śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06psp_2-3u:16_1_1: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ yathā pratipattavyaṃ rūpaṃ kauśika rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ vedanā
S06psp_2-3u:16_1_2: saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ kauśika vijñānena śūnyaṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:16_2: iti hi kauśika yā ca rūpaśūnyatā,
S06psp_2-3u:16_4: yā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā, advayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:17_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyam.
S06psp_2-3u:17_1: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano manasā śūnyaṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:17_2: iti hi yā ca cakṣuḥśūnyatā, yā ca śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥśūnyatā,
S06psp_2-3u:17_3: yā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā, advayam etad advaidhīkāram. evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:18_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātunā śūnyaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:18_1: evam abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātunā śūnyaḥ bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:18_2: iti hi pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatā cābdhātuśūnyatā ca tejodhātuśūnyatā ca vāyudhātusūnyatā cākāśadhātuśūnyatā ca vijñānadhātuśūnyatā (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:18_4: evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:19_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika, avidyāvidyayā śūnyā. evaṃ saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇopādānaṃ bhavo jātir jarāmaraṇaṃ jarāmaraṇena sūnyam.
S06psp_2-3u:19_2: evaṃ saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇopādānaṃ bhavo jātir jarāmaraṇanirodho jarāmaraṇanirodhena śūnyaḥ bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:19_3: iti hy avidyāśūnyatā cāvidyānirodhaśūnyatā yāvaj jarāmaraṇaśūnyatā ca jarāmaraṇanirodhaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:19_4: evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:20_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā śūnyā.
S06psp_2-3u:20_4: iti hi dānapāramitāśūnyatā ca śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:21_1: evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:21_2: iti hy adhyātmaśūnyatā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:22_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni.
S06psp_2-3u:22_1_1: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyā bodhisattvo
S06psp_2-3u:22_2: iti hi smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatā ca yāvad āveṇikabuddhadharmaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:23_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika samādhiḥ samādhinā śūnyaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:23_1: dhāraṇīmukhāni (PSP_2-3:7) dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ śūnyāni bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:23_2: iti hi samādhiśūnyatā ca dhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:24_0_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika śrāvakayānaṃ śrāvakayānena śūnyaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānena
S06psp_2-3u:24_0_1: śūnyaṃ mahāyānaṃ mahāyānena śūnyaṃ śrāvakaḥ śrāvakatvena śūnyaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ pratyekabuddhatvena
S06psp_2-3u:24_0_2: śūnyaḥ bodhisattvo bodhisattvena śūnyaḥ buddho buddhatvena śūnyaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:24_1: iti hi śrāvakayānaśūnyatā ca yāvan mahāyānaśūnyatā ca śrāvakaśūnyatā ca yāvad buddhaśūnyatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:24_2: evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:25_0: atha khalu sakro devānām indraḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:25_1: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ?
S06psp_2-3u:26_0: subhūtir āha: iha kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena rūpe na sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu vijñāne na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:26_1: cakṣuṣi na sthātavyaṃ rūpe na sthātavyaṃ cakṣurvijñāne na sthātavyaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe na sthātavyaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ na sthātavyam,
S06psp_2-3u:26_2_0: evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanasi na sthātavyaṃ dharmeṣu na sthātavyaṃ manovijñāne
S06psp_2-3u:26_2_1: na sthātavyaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśe na sthātavyaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ na sthātavyam
S06psp_2-3u:26_3: pṛthivīdhātau na sthātavyaṃ abdhātau na sthātavyaṃ tejodhātau na sthātavyaṃ vāyudhātau na sthātavyam ākāśadhātau na sthātavyaṃ vijñānadhātau na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:26_6: srotaāpattiphale na sthātavyam evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphale 'nāgāmiphale 'rhattvaphale pratyekabuddhatvaphale yāvad buddhatve na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:27_1: evam anityam iti sukham iti duḥkham ity ātmety anātmeti śāntam ity aśāntam iti viviktam ity aviviktam iti na sthātavyaṃ,

S06psp_2-3u:29_58: 11) sarvadharmā nopalabdhāḥ. evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām upalambhayogena na sthātavyam.
S06psp_2-3u:30_1: kathaṃ punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam? iti.
S06psp_2-3u:31_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:

S06psp_2-3u:32_1_0: apratiṣṭhitamānasaḥ sa khalu punas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sa na rūpe sthito
S06psp_2-3u:32_1_1: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthito na saṃskṛte dhātau sthito
S06psp_2-3u:32_2_0: evaṃ na vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu na pāramitāsu na

S06psp_2-3u:33_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:33_1: evaṃ hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ.

S06psp_2-3u:34_0: atha khalu tatra pariṣadi keṣāṃcid devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:34_1: yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣarutāni yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni prajñāyante tāni jalpyamānāni.
S06psp_2-3u:34_2: idaṃ punar na vijñāyate yad āryasthaviraḥ subhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate pravyāharati deśayaty upadiśati.

S06psp_2-3u:37_0: subhūtir āha: tathā hi devaputrā ekākṣaram apy atra na pravyāhriyate,
S06psp_2-3u:37_1: tan na śrūyate, tan na vijñāyate, tat kasya hetoḥ? anakṣarā hi prajñāpāramitā tasmān nāsti jñātā na śrotā na deśayitā anakṣarā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:37_2_0: tadyathāpi nāma devaputrās tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho buddhanirmitaṃ nirmimīyāc
S06psp_2-3u:37_2_1: catasraś ca pariṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ so 'bhinirmāya tāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:37_3: tat kiṃ manyadhve? devaputrā api nu tatra kiṃcid deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vājñātaṃ vā.
S06psp_2-3u:39_0: subhūtir āha: evam eva devaputrāḥ. sarvadharmā nirmitopamās tatra na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid ājñātam.
S06psp_2-3u:39_2: svapnāntaragatas tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paśyed dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:39_3: tat kiṃ manyadhve? devaputrā api nu tatra kiṃcid deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vājñātaṃ vā.
S06psp_2-3u:41_0: subhūtir āha : evaṃ devaputrāḥ svapnopamāḥ. sarve dharmās tatra na kenacic chrutaṃ na kenacid deśitaṃ na kenacid ājñātam.
S06psp_2-3u:41_1: tadyathāpi nāma devaputrā dvau puruṣau parvatakandare sthitvā buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ dharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātāṃ saṃghasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeyātām.
S06psp_2-3u:41_2: tato dvayor api tayoḥ pratiśrutkāsvaro niścaret.
S06psp_2-3u:41_3: tat kiṃ manyadhve? devaputrā api nu tayā pratiśrutkayā dvitīyaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:43_0: subhūtir āha: evam eva devaputraḥ. sarvadharmāḥ pratiśrutkopamās tatra na kiṃcid deśyate na śrūyate na vijñāyate.
S06psp_2-3u:43_1_0: tadyathāpi nāma devaputrā dakṣo māyākāro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe tathāgatam
S06psp_2-3u:43_1_1: arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ nirmimīyāc catasraś ca pariṣadaḥ so 'bhinirmāya nirmitānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:43_2: tat kiṃ manyadhve? devaputrā api nu tatra kenacid deśitaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā vijñātaṃ vā bhavet.
S06psp_2-3u:45_0: subhūtir āha: evam eva devaputrā māyopamāḥ sarvadharmā na tatra kaścid (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:46_0: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:47_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis tān devaputrān etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:47_1: na hi devaputrā rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā,
S06psp_2-3u:47_2: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ gambhīraṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā.
S06psp_2-3u:47_3: tat kasya hetor? na rūpasya svabhāvo gambhiro na sūkṣmaḥ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ na vijñānasya svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:47_4: na cakṣuṣaḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ na śrotasya na ghrāṇasya na jihvāyā na kāyasya na manasaḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:47_5: na pṛthivīdhātoḥ. svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:47_6: nābdhātor na tejodhātor na vāyudhātor nākāśadhātor na vijñānadhātoḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:47_8: na dānapāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:47_9: na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ nādhyātmaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:47_10: na bahirdhāśūnyatāyā nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:47_11: na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:47_12_0: evaṃ samyakprahāṇānām ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgasya
S06psp_2-3u:47_12_1: mārgasya satyānām abhijñānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:47_12_2: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛnāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādāśānām
S06psp_2-3u:47_12_3: āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo gambhīro na sūkṣmaḥ na sarvasamādhidhāraṇīmukhānāṃ

S06psp_2-3u:48_0: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:48_1: na khalu punar asyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ rūpaṃ prajñaptaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ prajñaptaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:48_2: yāvan na dhātavo nāyatanāni na pratityasamutpādaḥ prajñapto na pāramitā prajñaptā na bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ prajñaptāḥ,

S06psp_2-3u:48_5: 14) na daśatathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ prajñaptāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:48_6_0: nāpīha dharmadeśanāyāṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prajñaptaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:48_6_1: nārhattvaṃ na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ na bodhisattvatvaṃ prajñaptaṃ na bodhiḥ prajñaptā
S06psp_2-3u:49_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis tān devaputrān āmantrayāmāsa:
S06psp_2-3u:49_3: sā na kenacid deśitā na kenacic chrutā na kenacid vijñātā.
S06psp_2-3u:49_4: tena hi devaputrā ye srotaāpattiphale sthātukāmāḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:49_5: ye srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkartukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya,
S06psp_2-3u:49_8: ye pratyekabuddhatvaṃ prāptukāmā nemāṃ kṣāntim anāgamya.
S06psp_2-3u:49_9: evaṃ hi devaputrā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam apravyāhārāśravaṇatām upādāya.
S06psp_2-3u:50_0: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:51_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:51_1: māyopamā mama devaputrā dharmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyā nirmitopamā mama dharmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:51_2: te naiva kiṃcic chroṣyanti na paryavāpsyanti na sākṣātkariṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:52_0: atha khalu te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtisthaviram evam āhuḥ:
S06psp_2-3u:52_1: kiṃ punar bhadanta subhūte māyopamās te sattvā māyopamās te dharmaśravaṇikā nirmitopamās te sattvā nirmitopamās te dharmaśravaṇikāḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:53_0: subhūtir āha: evam etad devaputrā evam etat,
S06psp_2-3u:53_1: māyopamās te sattvā māyopamās te dharmaśravaṇikā,
S06psp_2-3u:53_2: nirmitopamās te sattvā nirmitopamās te dharmaśravaṇikāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:53_4: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam api devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:53_6: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'pi devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:53_9: svapnopamā māyopamāś. cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā svapnopamā māyopamāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:53_10: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manovijñānaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā svapnopamā māyopamā.
S06psp_2-3u:53_12: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramītā vīryapārmitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāpi svapnopamā māyopamā.
S06psp_2-3u:53_13: evam adhyātmaśūmyatā bahirdhāśūnyatādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāpi svapnopamā māyopamā.
S06psp_2-3u:53_16: abhijñā satyāni daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā api buddhadharmāḥ svapnopamā māyopamāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:53_19: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam api sakṛdāgāmy apy anāgāmiphalam apy anāgāmy apy arhatphalam apy arhann api svapnopamo māyopamaḥ pratyekabodhir api svapnopamā māyopamā,
S06psp_2-3u:54_0: atha khalu te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:54_1: buddhatvam api sthavira subhūte svapnopamaṃ māyopamam iti vadasi.
S06psp_2-3u:54_2: tat kiṃ manyase? nirvāṇam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:55_0: subhūtir āha: nirvāṇam apy ahaṃ devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ māyopamam iti vadāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:55_1: saced ahaṃ devaputrā nirvāṇād api kaṃcid dharmaviśiṣṭataraṃ jāniyāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:55_2: tam apy ahaṃ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ vadeyaṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:55_3: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi devaputrāḥ svapnaś ca māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:56_0_0: atha khalv āyuṣmāñ śāriputra āyuṣmāṃś ca mahāmaudgalyāyana āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākauṣṭhila
S06psp_2-3u:56_0_1: āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākātyāyana āyuṣmāṃś ca pūrṇo maitrāyaṇiputra āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākāśyapo
S06psp_2-3u:56_0_2: 'nekāni ca devakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇy āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviram evam āhuḥ:
S06psp_2-3u:56_1: ke 'syā bhadanta subhūte evaṃ gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evam atarkāyā evam atarkāvacarāyā evaṃ sūkṣmāyā (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:56_2: 16) evaṃ nipuṇāyā evaṃ durdṛśāyā evaṃ duranubodhāyā evaṃ śāntāyā evaṃ praṇītāyā evam alamāryāyā evaṃ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyāyā deśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti?
S06psp_2-3u:57_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis tān mahāśrāvakāṃs tāṃś ca devaputrān etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:57_1_0: avinivartanīyā āyuṣmanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ gambhīrāyā
S06psp_2-3u:57_1_1: evam atarkāyā evam atarkāvacarāyā evaṃ sūkṣmāyā evaṃ nipuṇāyā evaṃ durdṛśāyā evaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:57_1_2: duranubodhāyā evaṃ śāntāyā evaṃ praṇītāyā evam alamāryāyā evaṃ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyāyā
S06psp_2-3u:57_2: dṛṣṭasatyā vā pudgalā arhanto vā kṣīṇāsravāḥ paripūrṇasaṃkalpāḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:57_3: pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā bahubuddhakoṭiṣv avaropitakuśalamūlā vā kalyāṇamitraparigṛhitā vā.
S06psp_2-3u:57_4_0: te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ gambhīrāyā evam atarkāyā
S06psp_2-3u:57_4_1: evam atarkāvacarāyā evaṃ sūkṣmāyā evaṃ nipuṇāyā evaṃ durdṛśāyā evaṃ duranubodhāyā
S06psp_2-3u:57_4_2: evaṃ śāntāyā evaṃ praṇītāyā evam alamāryāyā evaṃ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyāyā deśyamānāyāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:58_0: tena khalu punar na rūpaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:58_2: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ śūnyam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:58_6: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānam ānimittam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:58_10: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānam apraṇihitam iti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:58_12: evaṃ nānutpāda iti, nānirodha iti, na śāntam iti, na viviktam iti vikalpayiṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:58_14_0: evam adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām
S06psp_2-3u:58_14_1: evaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni samyakprahāṇāny ṛddhipādānīndriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgamārgam
S06psp_2-3u:58_16: evaṃ na srotaāpattiphalaṃ na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ na pratyekabuddhatvaṃ na sarvākārajñatāṃ śūnyeti vikalpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:59_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis tān devaputrān etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:59_1_0: nāsyā devaputrāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ gambhīrāyā yāvad alamāryāyāḥ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyāyāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:59_1_1: kaścit pratyeṣako bhaviṣyati tat kasya hetos? tathā hy atra na kaścid dharmo deśyate
S06psp_2-3u:59_2: yathaivātra na kaścid dharmo deśyate na sūcyate na paridīpyate tathaivātra na kaścit pratyeṣako bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:60_0: atha khalv āyuṣmāñ śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:60_1: nanv āyuṣman subhūte iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante yad uta śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhayānaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:60_2_0: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ saṃparigraha upadiśyate prathamacittotpādam upādāya
S06psp_2-3u:60_2_1: yāvad daśamaś cittotpāda iti bodhisattvamārgaś copadiśyate yad uta dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā
S06psp_2-3u:60_2_2: kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā smṛtyupasthānāni samyakprahāṇāny
S06psp_2-3u:60_2_3: ṛddhipādā indriyāṇi balāṇi bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaś catvāry apramāṇāṃ catvāri
S06psp_2-3u:60_2_4: dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo 'bhijñāḥ satyāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni
S06psp_2-3u:60_3: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ saṃparigraha upadiṣyate evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nopapāduko bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:60_4_0: evam abhijñābhir aparihāṇadharmā buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyanti yaiś
S06psp_2-3u:60_4_1: ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣiṣyanti buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ
S06psp_2-3u:60_5_0: yaṃ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike dharmaṃ śroṣyanti sarvo 'sya dharmo na jātv
S06psp_2-3u:60_5_1: antarā vicchetsyati yāvan nānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddheti sadā samāhitaś
S06psp_2-3u:60_7: anācchedyapratibhānaḥ samāhitapratibhāno yuktapratibhānaḥ śliṣṭapratibhāno 'rthavatpratibhānaḥ sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānaś ca bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:61_0: subhūtir āha: evam etad āyuṣmañ śāriputra evam etat.
S06psp_2-3u:61_1: tathaiva tadyathā vadasi vistareṇeha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāny upadiṣṭāni yad uta śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ mahāyānaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:61_2: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ saṃparigrahā upadiṣṭā yāvad bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānā bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:61_5: cakṣuṣo 'nupalambhayogena, evaṃ śrotrasya ghrāṇasya jihvāyāḥ kāyasya manaso 'nupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:61_7: evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānasya manaḥsaṃsparśasya manaḥsaṃsparśajāyā vedanāyā anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:61_10: evam abdhātos tejodhātor vāyudhātor ākāśadhātor vijñānadhātor anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:61_12: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ. kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:61_15: evaṃ samyakprahāṇānām ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasyānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:61_17: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:62_0: atha khalv āyuṣmāñ chāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:62_1_0: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ triṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante
S06psp_2-3u:62_1_1: anupalambhayogena? kena kāraṇena bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃparigraha upadiśyate
S06psp_2-3u:62_1_2: yāvat sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati anupalambhayogena?
S06psp_2-3u:63_0: subhūtir āha: adhyātmaśūnyatām upādāyāyuṣmañ śāriputra triṇi yānāni vistareṇopodiśyante anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:63_2: 20) upādāya yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiśyante anupalambhayogena,
S06psp_2-3u:63_3_0: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃparigraha upadiśyate
S06psp_2-3u:64_0: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:64_1: asyā dharmadṛṣṭeḥ subhūtinā sthavireṇa bhāṣyamāṇāyā yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās teṣāṃ caitad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:64_2_0: asyā dharmadṛṣṭeḥ subhūtinā sthavireṇa bhāṣyamāṇāyā yan nu vayaṃ puṣpāṇy abhinirmāya
S06psp_2-3u:64_2_1: taiḥ puṣpair buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca subhūtiṃ ca sthaviram
S06psp_2-3u:65_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indras te trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikān devān upādāya yāvad akaniṣṭhā devā divyāni māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇy abhinirmāya,
S06psp_2-3u:65_1: taiḥ puṣpair buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca subhūtiṃ ca sthaviram imāṃ ca prajñāpāramitām abhyavakiranti sma,
S06psp_2-3u:65_2: abhiprakiranti sma, samanantarāvakīrṇāni ca tāni puṣpāṇi śakreṇa devānām indreṇa,
S06psp_2-3u:66_0: atha khalu sarvasmiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau puṣpasaṃstaraḥ saṃstṛto 'bhūt.
S06psp_2-3u:66_1: upariṣṭāc cāntarīkṣe puṣpakūṭāgāraṃ saṃsthitam abhūt ramaṇīyaṃ manoramam.
S06psp_2-3u:67_1: na punar imāni puṣpāṇi mayā sarvadevabhavaṇeṣu dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi pracaranti yānīmāni puṣpāṇi devaputrair abhyavakīrṇāni nirmitānīmāni puṣpāṇi na vṛkṣagulmalatānirjātāni,
S06psp_2-3u:67_2: yānīmāni devaputrair abhyavakīrṇāni manomayāny etāni puṣpāṇi naitāni puṣpāṇi vṛkṣagulmalatānirjātānīmāni devaputrair abhyavakīrṇāni.
S06psp_2-3u:68_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ sthaviraṃ subhūtiṃ etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:68_1: anirjātānīmāni bhadanta subhūte puṣpāṇi naitāni puṣpāṇi manonirjātāni nāpi (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:69_0: subhūtir āha: yat kauśikaivaṃ vadasi, anirjātānīmāni puṣpāṇi naitāni manonirjātāni nāpi vṛkṣagulmalatānirjātānīti.
S06psp_2-3u:69_1: yāni kauśikānirjātāni na tāni puṣpāṇi śakro devānām indra āha:
S06psp_2-3u:69_2: kiṃ punar bhadanta subhūte imāny eva puṣpāny anirjātāni,
S06psp_2-3u:69_3: atha rūpam apy anirjātaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ vijñānam apy anirjātaṃ?
S06psp_2-3u:70_0: subhūtiḥ sthavira āha: na kauśika imāny eva puṣpāṇy anirjātāni,
S06psp_2-3u:70_1: rūpam api kauśikānirjātaṃ yac cānirjātaṃ na tad rūpam.
S06psp_2-3u:70_2: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ vijñānaṃ kauśikānirjātaṃ yac cānirjātaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:70_3: cakṣuḥ kauśikānirjātaṃ yac cānirjātaṃ na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:70_4: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo manaḥ kauśikānirjātaṃ yac cānirjātaṃ na tan manaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:70_5: pṛthivīdhātuḥ kauśikānirjāto yaś cānirjāto na sa pṛthivīdhātur,
S06psp_2-3u:70_6: evam abdhātus tejodhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhatuḥ kauśikānirjāto yaś cānirjāto na sa vijñānadhātuḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:70_7: dānapāramitā kauśika anirjātā yā cānirjātā na sā dānapāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:70_8: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā kauśika anirjātā yā cānirjātā na sā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:70_9: adhyātmaśūnyatā kauśika anirjātā yā cānirjātā na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā kauśika anirjātā yā cānirjātā na sā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06psp_2-3u:70_10: smṛtyupasthānāni kauśika anirjātāni yāni cānirjātāni na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06psp_2-3u:70_11: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāny ṛddhipādāḥ indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭaṅgo mārgaḥ kauśika,
S06psp_2-3u:70_12: anirjāto yaś cānirjāto na sa mārgaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:70_13_0: evam abhijñāḥ satyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri
S06psp_2-3u:70_13_1: vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikābuddhadharmāḥ kauśika anirjātā ye
S06psp_2-3u:70_14: srotaāpattiphalaṃ kauśika anirjātaṃ yac cānirjātaṃ na tat srotaāpattiphalaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:70_15: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ kauśikānirjātaṃ yac cānirjātaṃ na tat sarvajñatvaṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:70_16: srotaāpannaḥ kauśika anirjāto yaś cānirjāto na sa srotaāpannaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:70_17: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmī, anāgāmī, arhan pratyekabuddhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kauśikānirjāto yaś cānirjāto na sa samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:71_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:71_2: sthaviro yatprajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati.
S06psp_2-3u:72_0: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:72_1: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, gambhīraprajño batāyam āryasubhūtiḥ sthaviro yatprajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati.
S06psp_2-3u:73_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:73_1: kathaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati?
S06psp_2-3u:74_0: bhagavān āha: rūpaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yac ca prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā,
S06psp_2-3u:74_1: tāṃ ca subhūtiḥ sthaviro na virodhayaty upadiśasti ca.
S06psp_2-3u:74_2: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yac ca prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā,
S06psp_2-3u:74_3: tāṃ ca subhūtiḥ sthaviro na virodhaty upadiśati ca.
S06psp_2-3u:74_4: tat kasya hetor? yā dharmatā sā na virudhyate yā na virudhyate tāṃ ca subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na virodhayati,
S06psp_2-3u:74_6: evaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:74_8_0: evaṃ smṛtyupasthāneṣu samyakprahāṇeṣv ṛddhipādendriyeṣu baleṣu bodhyaṅgeṣv āryāṣṭāṅge
S06psp_2-3u:74_9: evaṃ srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale 'nāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratyekabuddhatve sarvajñatve srotaāpanna iti kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā,
S06psp_2-3u:74_10: tāṃ ca subhūtiḥ sthaviro na virodhayaty upadiśati ca.
S06psp_2-3u:74_11: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmī, anāgāmī, arhan pratyekabuddhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yac ca prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā,
S06psp_2-3u:74_12: tāṃ ca subhūtiḥ sthaviro na virodhayaty upadiśati ca.
S06psp_2-3u:74_13: tat kasya hetor? yā kauśika dharmatā sā na virudhyate,
S06psp_2-3u:74_14: yā na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati,
S06psp_2-3u:74_15: evaṃ hi kauśika subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati.
S06psp_2-3u:75_0_0: subhūtir āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. yathā bhagavatā prajñaptimātrāḥ sarvadharmā
S06psp_2-3u:75_0_1: upadiṣṭā evaṃ hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñaptimātrān sarvadharmān
S06psp_2-3u:75_0_2: viditvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ punaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_2-3u:75_0_3: na rūpe śikṣate na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:75_1: tat kasya hetos? thathā hi rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:75_2: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:75_3: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:75_4: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi sa dānapāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:75_5: evaṃ na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:75_6: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi sa prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:75_7: adhyātmaśūnyatāyām api na śikṣate yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyām api na śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:75_8: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi so 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām api na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:75_10_0: evaṃ samyakprahāneṣv ṛddhipādeṣv indriyeṣu baleṣu bodhyaṅgeṣv āryāṣṭāṅgeṣu mārgeṣv
S06psp_2-3u:75_10_1: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣv abhijñāsu satyeṣu baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv
S06psp_2-3u:75_11: na srotaāpattiphale na sakṛdāgāmiphale nānāgāmiphale nārhattve na pratyekabuddhatve śikṣate sarvajñatve 'pi na śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:75_12: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi sa sarvajñatvaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:76_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:76_1: kena kāraṇena bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ samanupaśyati na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ samanupaśyati.
S06psp_2-3u:76_4_0: satyāny abhijñādaśabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān
S06psp_2-3u:76_4_1: buddhadharmān na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate yāvat sarvajñatvaṃ api na samanupaśyati
S06psp_2-3u:77_0: subhūtir āha: tathā hi kauśika rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:77_3_1: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ satyāny abhijñā daśabalāni
S06psp_2-3u:77_3_2: vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā yāvat sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayā
S06psp_2-3u:77_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi kauśika rūpaśūnyatā rūpaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati yāvan na sarvajñatāśūnyatā sarvajñatāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati.
S06psp_2-3u:77_5: yaḥ kauśika iha śūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate sa rūpaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa.
S06psp_2-3u:77_7_1: dharmeṣv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu satyeṣv abhijñāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvasamādhiṣu
S06psp_2-3u:77_7_2: sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu daśatathāgatabaleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu
S06psp_2-3u:77_8: yaḥ kauśika rūpaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa yāvat sarvajñatāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa sa dānapāramitāyām api śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa.
S06psp_2-3u:77_9: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām api śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa.
S06psp_2-3u:77_10: adhyātmaśūnyatāyām api śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyām api śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa.
S06psp_2-3u:77_11: smṛtyupasthāneṣu samyakprahāṇeṣv ṛddhipādeṣv indriyeṣu baleṣu bodhyaṅgeṣv āryāṣṭāṅge mārge śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa.
S06psp_2-3u:77_12: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣv abhijñāsu satyeṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣate advaidhīkāreṇa.
S06psp_2-3u:78_0: na rūpasya hānaye śikṣate na vṛddhaye śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:78_1: na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasya hānaye śikṣate na vṛddhaye śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:78_2: evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:78_5: dānapāramitāyā na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:78_6: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:78_7: smṛtyupasthānānāṃ na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:78_8: evaṃ samyakprahāṇānām ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ mārgasya na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:78_9: apramāṇānāṃ dhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:78_10: adhyātmaśūyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:78_11: satyānām abhijñānāṃ daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ yāvat sarvajñatāyā na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:78_12: yo rūpasya na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate yāvat sarvajñatāyā na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate sa na rūpasya parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:78_13: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ na vijñānasya parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:78_14: evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ pratītyasamutpādānāṃ na parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:78_15_0: evaṃ pāramitānāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇam apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:78_15_1: satyānām abhijñānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ na parigrahāya śikṣate nāntardhānāya
S06psp_2-3u:78_16: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ yāvat sarvajñatāyā na parigrahāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate.
S06psp_2-3u:79_0: śāriputra āha: kiṃ kāraṇam āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpasya parigrahāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate,
S06psp_2-3u:79_1: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya na parigrahāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate yāvat sarvajñatāyā na parigrahāya nāntardhānāya śikṣate?
S06psp_2-3u:80_0: subhūtir āha: tathā hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra rūpasya parigraho nāsti.
S06psp_2-3u:80_1: tat kasya hetor? na rūpaṃ rūpaṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_2-3u:80_2: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārās tathā hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra vijñānasya parigraho nāsti.
S06psp_2-3u:80_3: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi na (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:80_5_1: dharmāṇāṃ satyānām abhijñānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:80_6: tat kasya hetos? tathā hy āveṇikabuddhadharmā nāveṇikabuddhadharmān parigṛhṇanti.
S06psp_2-3u:80_7: tathā hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra sarvajñatāyāḥ parigraho nāsti.
S06psp_2-3u:80_8: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi sarvajñatā na sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_2-3u:80_10: etaṃ hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāparigrahāya sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.
S06psp_2-3u:81_0: śāriputra āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.
S06psp_2-3u:82_0: subhūtir āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati sarvadharmāṇām aparigrahayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:83_0: śāriputra āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇām aparigrahāya nāntardhānāya śikṣitvā kathaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati?
S06psp_2-3u:84_0_0: subhūtir āha: tathā hy āyuṣmañ śariputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:84_0_1: caran na rūpasyotpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ nodgrahaṃ notsargaṃ na saṃkleśaṃ na vyavadānaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:84_0_2: nācayaṃ nāpacayaṃ na hāniṃ na vṛddhiṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:84_1: tat kasya hetos? tathā hy āyuṣmañ śariputra rūpaṃ rūpasvabhāvena na vidyate,
S06psp_2-3u:84_2_0: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyāyuṣmañ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_2-3u:84_2_1: notpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ nodgrahaṃ notsargaṃ na saṃkleśaṃ na vyavadānaṃ nācayaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:84_3: tat kasya hetos? athā hy āyuṣmañ śariputra vijñānaṃ vijñānasvabhāvena na vidyate.
S06psp_2-3u:84_4_0: evaṃ vyastasamastānāṃ skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ pratītyasamutpādasya pāramitānāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:84_5: 27) pratisaṃvidām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ yāvat sarvajñatāyā notpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ nodgrahaṃ notsargaṃ na saṃkleśaṃ na vyavadānaṃ nācayaṃ nāpacayaṃ na hāniṃ na vṛddhiṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:84_6: tat kasya hetos? tathā hy āyuṣmañ śāriputra sarvajñatā sarvajñatāsvabhāvena na saṃvidyate,
S06psp_2-3u:84_7_0: evaṃ hy āyuṣmañ śariputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇām anutpādāyānirodhāyānudgrahāyānutsargāyāsaṃkleśāyāvyavadānāya
S06psp_2-3u:84_7_1: nācayāya nāpacayāya na hānaye na vṛddhaye śikṣate prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate sarvajñatāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:85_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:86_0: śāriputra āha: prajñāpāramitā kauśika subhūteḥ parivartād gaveṣitavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:87_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:87_1: tavaiva āryasubhūte, anubhāvas tavaitad adhiṣṭhānaṃ yad āryaśāriputra,
S06psp_2-3u:87_2: evaṃ vadati; prajñāpāramitā kauśikāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ parivartād gaveṣitavyeti.
S06psp_2-3u:88_0: subhūtir āha: na mamaiṣa kauśikānubhāvaḥ na mamaitad adhiṣṭhānam.
S06psp_2-3u:90_0: subhūtir āha: tathāgatasyaiṣa kauśikānubhāvas tathāgatasyaitad adhiṣṭhānaṃ na cānyatra niradhiṣṭhānadharmatāyās tathāgata upalabhyate,
S06psp_2-3u:91_0: devendra āha: katham āryasubhūte niradhiṣṭhāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu evaṃ vadasi? tathāgatasyaiṣo 'nubhāvas tathāgatasyaitad adhiṣṭhānam iti.
S06psp_2-3u:92_0: subhūtir āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, nānyatra niradhiṣṭhānadharmatāyās tathāgata upalabhyate,
S06psp_2-3u:92_9: na ca tathāgate rūpadharmatā na vedanātathatāyāṃ na saṃjñātathatayāṃ na saṃskāratathatāyāṃ na vijñānatathatāyāṃ tathāgata upalabhyate,
S06psp_2-3u:92_17: tat kasya hetor? yaḥ kauśika tathāgato na rūpatathatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyukto vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānatathatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:92_18: yaḥ kauśika tathāgato na rūpadharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyukto vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānadharmatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:92_19: na cānyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:92_20: na cānyatra rūpadharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:92_21: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā na cānyatra vijñānatathatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyukto na cānyatra vijñānadharmatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:92_22: vistareṇa yāvad yas tathāgato na sa sarvajñatātathatāyāṃ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:92_24_0: na cānyatra sarvajñatāyāḥ saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ na cānyatra sarvajñatādharmatāyāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:92_24_1: saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ yo hi kauśika sarvadharmeṣu na saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ tasyaiṣo

S06psp_2-3u:120_4: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca rūpaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:120_6: tat kasya hetor? na hi śūnyatā śūnyatāyām avatāraṃ labhate,
S06psp_2-3u:120_13: yāvat sarvākārajñatāśūnyataiva taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:120_14: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyām avatāraṃ labhate,
S06psp_2-3u:120_17: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate,
S06psp_2-3u:121_0: na khalu punaḥ kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā manuṣyo vāmanuṣyo vāvatāraṃ lapsyate.
S06psp_2-3u:121_1: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca sarvasattvānām antike maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣā bhāvitā sā cānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:121_2_0: (PSP_2-3:37) na ca te kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:121_2_1: kariṣyanti tat kasya hetos? tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca dānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:121_3_0: yair vā kauśika cāturmahārājakāyikair devaputrair iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau
S06psp_2-3u:121_3_1: trayastriṃśair vā yāmair vā tuṣitair vā nirmāṇaratibhir vā paranirmitavaśavartibhir
S06psp_2-3u:121_3_2: vā brahmakāyikair vā brahmapurohitair vā brahmapārṣadyair vā yāvad akaniṣṭhair vā
S06psp_2-3u:121_3_3: devaputrair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditaṃ na cāyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
S06psp_2-3u:121_3_4: śrutā nodgrahītā na dhāritā na vācitā na paryavāptā,
S06psp_2-3u:121_4: tair devaputrair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā sarvajñatācittenāvirahitaiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:122_0_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika ye kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:122_0_1: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti avirahitāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:122_1: na khalu punaḥ kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā śūnyāgāragatānāṃ vā abhyavakāśagatānāṃ vā utpathagatānāṃ vā bhayaṃ vā stambhitatvaṃ vā bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:122_2: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś cādhyātmaśūnyatā subhāvitā anupalambhayogena,
S06psp_2-3u:122_4: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā subhāvitā anupalambhayogena yāvad abhāvasvabhāvasunyatā subhāvitā anūpalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:123_0_0: atha khalu tāvad eva trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ye cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās
S06psp_2-3u:123_0_1: trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paramrmitavaśavartino yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikā
S06psp_2-3u:123_1_0: vayaṃ bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
S06psp_2-3u:123_1_1: saṃvidhāsyāmaḥ ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
S06psp_2-3u:123_1_2: likhiṣyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti avirahitāś ca bhaviṣyanti sarvajñatācittena.
S06psp_2-3u:123_2: (PSP_2-3:38) tat kasya hetos? tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya nirayā ucchidyante,
S06psp_2-3u:123_3: tiryagyoniyamalokā asurāḥ kāyā manuṣyadāridryā upadravā upasargāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:123_4: sarve 'py ucchidyante. bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathanāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:123_5_0: caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ dānapāramitāyāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:123_5_2: loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā
S06psp_2-3u:123_6_0: caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ pañcānām
S06psp_2-3u:123_6_1: indriyāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ balānāṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya caturṇām
S06psp_2-3u:123_6_2: āryasatyānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:123_6_3: vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛnāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ loke
S06psp_2-3u:123_7: anekeṣāṃ samādhīnām anekeṣāṃ dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ sarvajñatāyā bodhisattvamārgasya loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:124_0: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni loke prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:124_5: evaṃ trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇo yāvad akaniṣṭhāś ca devaputrā loke prajñāyante.
S06psp_2-3u:125_0: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya srotaāpattiphalaṃ prajñāyate,
S06psp_2-3u:125_1: srotaāpannaḥ. prajñāyate. evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmiphalam anāgāmī arhattvam arhal loke prajñāyate,
S06psp_2-3u:126_0: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sattvaparipākaḥ prajñāyate,
S06psp_2-3u:126_4_0: buddharatnaṃ prajñāyate, dharmaratnaṃ prajñāyate, saṃgharatnaṃ prajñāyate. anena
S06psp_2-3u:127_0: evam ukte bhagavāñ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:127_1: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya nirayatiryagyoniyamaloke gataya ucchidyante,
S06psp_2-3u:127_2: devadāridryaṃ manuṣyadāridryam upadravā upasargāḥ sarve 'py ucchidyante.
S06psp_2-3u:127_3: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:127_4_0: daśānāṃ pāramitānāṃ daśānāṃ bodhisattvabhūmīnām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:127_4_1: dharmāṇāṃ satyānām abhijñānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:127_5: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ sarvākārajñatāyā bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:127_6: kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni gṛhapatimahāśālakulāni bodhisattvaṃ mahāsāttvam āgamya loke prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:127_8: cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:127_10: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmiphalam anāgāmī arhattvam arhaś ca loke prajñāyate,
S06psp_2-3u:127_16_0: buddharatnasya dharmaratnasya saṃgharatnasya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya loke
S06psp_2-3u:127_16_1: prādurbhāvo bhavati tasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa
S06psp_2-3u:127_16_2: lokena satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cātra nu
S06psp_2-3u:127_17: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sa kauśika satkartavyāṃ gurukartavyāṃ mānayitavyāṃ pūjayitavyāṃ manyeta yo bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkartavyaṃ gurukartavyaṃ manyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:127_19: 40) lokena satkartavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cātra nu rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:127_20: yaś ca kauśika imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratipūrṇaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:127_21: tadyathāpi nāma ikṣuvanaṃ vā naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā sālivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed,
S06psp_2-3u:127_22_0: yaś ca prathamacittotpādikaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam avirahitaṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:127_22_1: satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pujayed ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati tat
S06psp_2-3u:127_22_2: kasya hetor bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati? tathā hi na kauśika śrāvakapratyekabuddhān
S06psp_2-3u:127_22_3: āgamya bodhisattvās tathāgatāś cārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:127_23: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ punar āgamya śrāvakapratyekabuddhās tathāgatāś cārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:127_24: tasmāt tarhi kauśika sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cātra nu rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:128_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:128_1: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad amī bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇantaḥ paryavāpnuvanto dhārayanto vācayanto yoniśaś ca manasikurvantaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:128_3: sattvāṃś ca paripācayanti buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayanti,
S06psp_2-3u:128_4: buddhakṣetrāc ca buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsanāya,
S06psp_2-3u:128_5: yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣeyus tān buddhān bhagavataḥ pūjayituṃ taiḥ pūjayeyus.
S06psp_2-3u:128_6_0: tac caiṣāṃ tathaiva ṛdhyate. yaṃ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike sthitvā dharmaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:128_6_1: śṛṇvanti sa caiṣāṃ dharmas tāvad eva na pramuṣyate yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_2-3u:128_7_0: iti kulasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti jananīsaṃpadaṃ ca parivārasaṃpadaṃ ca lakṣaṇasaṃpadaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:128_7_1: ca prabhāsaṃpadaṃ ca cakṣuḥsaṃpadaṃ ca svarasaṃpadaṃ ca samādhisaṃpadaṃ ca dhāraṇīsaṃpadaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:128_8: upāyakauśalyena (PSP_2-3:41) ātmānaṃ buddhavigrahaṃ nirmāya lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmanti,
S06psp_2-3u:128_9: yatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatām utpādo nāsti te tatra gatvā dānapāramitāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante.
S06psp_2-3u:128_10: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante.
S06psp_2-3u:128_12: evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante.
S06psp_2-3u:128_13: dhyānānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. apramāṇānām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante.
S06psp_2-3u:128_15: evaṃ samyakprahāṇānām ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya varṇaṃ bhāṣante.
S06psp_2-3u:128_16: caturṇām āryasatyānām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante.
S06psp_2-3u:128_17: upāyakuśalena ca dharmaṃ deśayanti yānatrayeṇa ca sattvān vinayanti,
S06psp_2-3u:129_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:129_1: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad anayā gambhīrayā prajñāpāramitāyā parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ parigṛhīta bhavanti.
S06psp_2-3u:129_2_0: yad uta dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā
S06psp_2-3u:129_2_1: sarve bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni sarvaśūnyatā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:129_2_2: satyābhijñā daśabalāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ yāvad
S06psp_2-3u:129_2_3: vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātava āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca parigṛhītāni bhavanti.
S06psp_2-3u:129_4: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ sarvākārajñatā parigṛhitā bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:130_0: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:130_1: prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ parigṛhitā bhavanti.
S06psp_2-3u:130_2_0: evaṃ sarve bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni sarvaśūnyatā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:130_2_1: satyābhijñāḥ sarve kuśalāḥ karmapathā daśabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
S06psp_2-3u:131_0_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitayā udgṛhītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā
S06psp_2-3u:131_0_1: likhitayā yoniśo manasikṛtayā yān guṇān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pratilabhate
S06psp_2-3u:131_0_2: dṛṣṭa eva dharme tān śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te.
S06psp_2-3u:131_1: evaṃ bhagavann iti śakro devānām indro bhagavataḥt pratyaśroṣīt bhagavān etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:131_2_0: yaḥ kaścit kauśikānyatīrthikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā
S06psp_2-3u:131_2_1: abhimāniko vā pudgalo bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam itaḥ prajñāpāramitāto vivecayitukāmo
S06psp_2-3u:131_3_0: vivaditukāmo bhaviṣyati, vigrahītukāmo bhaviṣyati, virodhayitukāmo bhaviṣyati, teṣāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:131_3_2: vigrahā vivādā virodhāḥ kṣipraṃ punar evāntardhāsyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:131_4: teṣāṃ vivecayitukāmānāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ na te 'bhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:131_5: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dīrgharātraṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā,
S06psp_2-3u:131_6: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā.
S06psp_2-3u:131_7: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ vigrahān vivādān virodhān āpadyante te 'dhyātmikabāhyā dharmāḥ sarve sarvadā parityaktā.
S06psp_2-3u:131_8: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ sattvadauḥśīlyam āpadyante tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_2-3u:131_9: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ krodhavyāpādavihiṃsām āpadyante tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_2-3u:131_10: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ kausīdyam āpadyante tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān vīryapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_2-3u:131_11: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ vikṣiptacittam āpadyante tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān dhyāne pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_2-3u:131_12: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ dauṣprajñām āpadyante tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajya tān sattvān mahāprajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_2-3u:131_13: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ kauśika sattvā dīrgharātraṃ saṃsāre saṃsaranti yad utānunayapratighaparyavasthāne tadbodhisattvo mahāsattva (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:131_14: 43) upāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ vinīya tān sattvāṃś caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_2-3u:131_17: evaṃ samyakprahāneṣv ṛddhipādeṣv indriyeṣu baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣv āryāṣṭāṅgeṣu mārgeṣu śūnyatāyāṃ vānimitte 'praṇihite samādhidhāraṇīmukheṣu ca pratiṣṭhāpayati.

S06psp_2-3u:177_4: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣata evaṃ bhavaty:
S06psp_2-3u:177_5: ahaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carāmi, ahaṃ śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:177_6: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikīṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayata evaṃ bhavaty:
S06psp_2-3u:177_9: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikaṃ vīryam ārambhamāṇasyaivaṃ bhavati:
S06psp_2-3u:177_12: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasyaivaṃ bhavaty:
S06psp_2-3u:177_15: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:177_19: sa tenonnatiṃ gacchati. tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya laukikyāṃ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyāṃ sthitasyaivaṃ bhavaty:
S06psp_2-3u:177_20: ahaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni, bhāvayāmi, ahaṃ samyakprahāṇāni, aham ṛddhipādān, aham indriyāṇi, ahaṃ balāni, ahaṃ bodhyaṅgāni, aham āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:177_22: ahaṃ sarvasamādhīn, ahaṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni, aham apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr bhāvayāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:177_24: aham abhijñā, ahaṃ daśabalāni, ahaṃ vaiśāradyāni, ahaṃ pratisaṃvidaḥ, aham aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:177_29: evaṃ hi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo laukikeṣu dharmeṣu carann unnatiṃ gacchati.
S06psp_2-3u:177_30: ahaṃkāramamakārābhiniveśena. tasya khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitā paridamanāya pariṇāmanāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:178_0: iha punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lokottareṣu dharmeṣu caran dānaṃ dadad dāyakaṃ nopalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:178_1: pratigrāhakaṃ nopalabhate, deyaṃ ca nopalabhate. evaṃ hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran paridamanāya pratyupasthito bhavati pariṇāmanāya.
S06psp_2-3u:178_2: evaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣan kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayamāno vīryam ārambhamāṇo dhyānaṃ dhyāyan prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan prajñāṃ nopalabhate.
S06psp_2-3u:178_9: evaṃ mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇāṃ ca bhāvayan nopalabhate yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāvayan nopalabhate.
S06psp_2-3u:178_10: evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran paridamanāya pariṇāmanāya ca pratyupasthito bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:179_0: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:179_1_0: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇan
S06psp_2-3u:179_1_1: vā dhārayan vā vācayan vā paryavāpnuvan vā pravartayan vā svādhyāyan vā yoniśo manasikurvan
S06psp_2-3u:179_1_2: vā saṃgrāmaśīrṣam ārūḍhaḥ saṃgrāme vartamāne saṃgrāme 'vatīrṇo vā śayito vātikrānto
S06psp_2-3u:179_1_3: vā niṣaṇṇo vā sthito vā syāt,
S06psp_2-3u:179_2_0: asthānaṃ kauśikānavakāśo yat tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām
S06psp_2-3u:179_2_1: udgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ pravartayataḥ svādhyāyato yoniśo manasikurvato
S06psp_2-3u:179_2_2: vā kaścid eva kāṇḍaṃ vā śastraṃ vā loṣṭaṃ vā kṣipet kṣiptāni vā tasya tāni śarīre
S06psp_2-3u:179_3: paropakramena vāsya jīvitāntarāyo bhaven naitat sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06psp_2-3u:179_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā dīrgharātram iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā ātmano rāgakāṇḍāni rāgaśastrāṇi nirjitāni bhavanti.
S06psp_2-3u:179_6: ātmano doṣakāṇḍāni doṣaśastrāni mohakāṇḍāni mohaśastrāṇi nirjitāni.
S06psp_2-3u:179_7: pareṣām api doṣakāṇḍāni doṣaśastrāṇi mohakāṇḍāni mohaśastrāṇi nirjitām.
S06psp_2-3u:179_8: ātmano dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāni dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi nirjitāni pareṣām api dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāni dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi nirjitāni.
S06psp_2-3u:179_13: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā kāṇḍaṃ vā śastraṃ vā śarīre kṣiptaṃ na patati.
S06psp_2-3u:180_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:180_1: avirahitaś ca sarvajñatācittena bhaviṣyati tasya kaścid evābhaiṣajyam avakiret,
S06psp_2-3u:180_2: kākhordaṃ vā kuryād agnikhadāṃ vopanāmayec chastreṇa vā hanyād viṣaṃ vā dadyād udake vainac chorayet sarvāṇy etāni tasya na krāmanti.
S06psp_2-3u:180_3: tat kasya hetor? mahāvidyaiṣā kauśika yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:180_4: anuttaraiṣā (PSP_2-3:55) kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:180_5: atra hi kauśika śikṣamāṇaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā nātmavyābādhāya cetayate,
S06psp_2-3u:181_0: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi naivātmānam upalabhate.
S06psp_2-3u:181_2: na rūpam upalabhate. na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānam upalabhate.
S06psp_2-3u:181_5: na paravyābādhāya cetayate, nobhayavyābādhāya cetayate. anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ pratilabhate sarvasattvāṃś cāvalokayati.
S06psp_2-3u:181_6: tat kasya hetor? atra hi vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇair atītais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā.
S06psp_2-3u:181_7: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:181_8: ye 'pi te daśadiglokadhātuṣv etarhi pratyutpannās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_2-3u:182_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika yatremāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:182_1: na tatra maṇuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā avatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate.
S06psp_2-3u:182_2_0: tat kasya hetos? tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pūjārthāya trisāhasramahāsāhasre
S06psp_2-3u:182_2_1: lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:182_2_2: paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā yāvad akaniṣṭhā
S06psp_2-3u:182_3_0: ye 'py anyeṣv aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrā yāvad
S06psp_2-3u:182_3_1: akaniṣṭhā devāputrās te 'pi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
S06psp_2-3u:182_4_0: (PSP_2-3:56) ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti te ca devaputrā
S06psp_2-3u:182_4_1: agatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:182_5: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati tasyeme dṛṣṭadhārmikā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:182_6_0: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika ye kecid bodhimaṇḍagatā vā bodhimaṇḍaparisāmantagatā vā bodhimaṇḍābhyantaragatā
S06psp_2-3u:182_6_1: vā tiryagyonigatān apy upādāya na te śakyante manuṣyeṇa vā amanuṣyeṇa vā viheṭhayituṃ
S06psp_2-3u:182_7: tat kasya hetor? atra hi niṣadya taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā.
S06psp_2-3u:182_8: anāgatair api pratyutpannair api tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbhotsyate abhisaṃbudhyate ca.
S06psp_2-3u:182_10: sukhe 'bhaye 'nudvege 'nuttrāse 'vaire 'vyābādhe 'sapatne pratiṣṭhāpyāprameyān asaṃkhyeyān sattvān divyamānuṣyakāyaṃ saṃpattau pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
S06psp_2-3u:182_12_0: tat kasya hetor? anayaiva kauśika prajñāpāramitayā sapṛthivīpradeśaś caityabhūtaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:182_12_1: kṛtaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ vandanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyo 'rcanīyo
S06psp_2-3u:183_0: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:183_1_0: yo hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatām
S06psp_2-3u:183_1_2: samantāc ca dīpamālābhir bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:183_2: yaś ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya śarīrāṇi stūpeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati pratiṣṭhāpya pratigṛhṇīyād dhārayed vācayet tāni ca satkuryād gurukuryād (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:184_0: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:184_1: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra pratiprakṣyāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:184_3: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśika yeyaṃ tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarvajñatā yo cāyaṃ tathāgatasyātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛttaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:184_4: sa katarasyāṃ pratipadi śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛttaḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:185_0: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:185_1: ihaiva bhagavan śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prajñāpāramitāyām anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛttaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:186_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛttaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:187_0: tasmāt tarhi kauśika nānenātmabhāvaśarīrapratilambhena tathāgatas tathāgata iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
S06psp_2-3u:187_1: sarvajñatāyāṃ tu pratilabdhāyāṃ tathāgatas tathāgata iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
S06psp_2-3u:187_2: yeyaṃ kauśika sarvajñatā sā prajñāpāramitā nirjātā.
S06psp_2-3u:187_7: āśrayabhūtatvāt sarvasattvānāṃ caityabhūto vandanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyo 'rcanīyo 'pacāyanīyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:187_8: evaṃ ca mama parinirvṛtasyāpi sata eṣāṃ śarīrāṇāṃ pūjā bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:188_0: tasmāt tarhi kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā satkāreṇa vācayiṣyati dhārayiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:188_1: puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ samantāc ca dīpamālābhir bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed arcayed apacāyet,
S06psp_2-3u:188_2: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati.
S06psp_2-3u:189_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? sarvajñajñānasya hi kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:189_2: yaḥ kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya saptaratnamaye stūpe śarīraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet saptaratnamaye vā samudge vā kṛtvā parivahet,
S06psp_2-3u:189_4: yaś ca iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyāmānāyāṃ vā pustakagatāyāṃ vā satkāraṃ kuryād gurukāraṃ kuryād mānanāṃ pūjanām arcanām apacāyanāṃ kuryāt,
S06psp_2-3u:190_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? sarvajñajñānasya tena pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyati ato nirjātā hi pañcapāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:190_3: ato nirjātā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ ato nirjātāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā,
S06psp_2-3u:190_7: ato nirjātā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kulasaṃpad bhogasaṃpad parivārasaṃpad,
S06psp_2-3u:190_10: ato nirjātā cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartmo brahmapārṣadyā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇo yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrā,
S06psp_2-3u:190_14: ato nirjātācintyā atulyā anuttarā niruttarā asamā asamasamā sarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_2-3u:191_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:191_1_0: ya ime bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na satkurvanti na gurukurvanti
S06psp_2-3u:191_1_1: na mānayanti na pūjayanti nārcayanti nāpacāyante puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:191_1_2: kiṃ nu bhagavañ jñāsyanti evaṃ maharddhikā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyatīti,
S06psp_2-3u:191_2: evaṃ mahānuśaṃsā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyatīti,
S06psp_2-3u:192_0: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:192_1: tat kiṃ manyase kauśika kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe 'vetyaprasādena samanvāgatā,
S06psp_2-3u:192_4: ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣā ye dharme niṣkāṅkṣā ye saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣā,
S06psp_2-3u:192_5: ye buddhe niṣṭhāṃgatā ye dharme niṣṭhāṃgatā ye saṃghe niṣṭhāṃgatāḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:193_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:193_1: alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe 'vetyaprasādena samanvāgatā ye dharme 'vetyaprasādena samanvāgatā ye saṃghe 'vetyaprasādena samanvāgatā,
S06psp_2-3u:193_2: ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣā ye dharme niṣkāṅkṣā ye saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣā,
S06psp_2-3u:193_3: ye buddhe niṣṭhāṃgatā ye dharme niṣṭhāṃgatā ye saṃghe niṣṭhāṃgatāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:194_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase kauśika kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:194_1: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:194_2: kiyantas te jāmbādvīpakā manuṣyā ye 'ṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:194_3: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:194_4: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:194_5: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:194_6: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannā,
S06psp_2-3u:194_7: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye rāgadoṣamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāminaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:194_8: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:194_9: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pañcānām ūrdhvabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
