S06psp_2-3u:233_2: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavan satkṛtayā gurukṛtayā mānitayā pūjitayā atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitā pūjitāś ca,
S06psp_2-3u:233_3_0: ye 'pi te bhagavan pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu
S06psp_2-3u:233_3_1: sattvās tebhya ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya pūjārthaṃ saptaratnamayān
S06psp_2-3u:233_3_2: stūpān pratiṣṭhāpayed yojanocchritāṃs tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād
S06psp_2-3u:233_4: api nu te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:234_0_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adho vidikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
S06psp_2-3u:234_0_1: lokadhātuṣu sattvās tebhya ekaikaḥ sattvas tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya pūjārthaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:234_0_2: saptaratnamayān stūpān pratiṣṭhāpayed yojanocchritāṃs tāṃś ca kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśesaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:234_0_3: vā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed arcayed apacāyet divyapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhiḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:234_1: api nu te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:235_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat.
S06psp_2-3u:236_0: śakra āha: ataḥ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06psp_2-3u:236_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed vācayet paryavāpnuyād yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt tāṃś ca (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:236_2: 67) satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed arcayed apacāyet divyapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhiś ca pūjayed arcayed apacāyet,
S06psp_2-3u:236_3: ayam eva bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasmāt pūrvakāt kulaputrād vā kuladuhitṛto vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06psp_2-3u:236_4: tathā hi bhagavann asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarve kuśalā dharmā antargatāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:236_5_0: tadyathā daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāś catvāri dhyānāṃ catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:236_5_1: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmās trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni catvāry āryasatyāni ṣaḍ abhijñā
S06psp_2-3u:236_5_2: aṣṭa vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā
S06psp_2-3u:236_5_3: vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā
S06psp_2-3u:236_5_4: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni
S06psp_2-3u:236_6: pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mārgākārajñatā sarvajñatā sarvākārajñatā,
S06psp_2-3u:236_7: idaṃ tad buddhānāṃ bhagavatā śāsanaṃ yatra śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ śrāvakāś ca nirjātā niryānti niryāsyanti ca.
S06psp_2-3u:237_0: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:237_1: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, bahu te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:237_2_0: aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam acintyam atulyam aparimāṇaṃ ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā
S06psp_2-3u:237_2_1: pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś
S06psp_2-3u:237_2_2: ca manasikariṣyanti uttare ca satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:238_0_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitā nirjātā hi kauśika tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:238_0_1: pañca pāramitā sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā
S06psp_2-3u:238_0_3: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ pañca cakṣūṃṣi ṣaḍ abhijñā aṣṭa vimokṣā navānupūrvavihāra
S06psp_2-3u:238_1: prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi kauśika mārgākārajñatā sarvajñatā sarvākārajñatā,
S06psp_2-3u:239_0_0: tasmāt tarhi kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:239_0_1: likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś
S06psp_2-3u:239_0_2: ca manasikariṣyati tāṃ ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati arcayiṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:239_1: asya puṇyābhisaṃskārasyāsau paurvakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06psp_2-3u:239_2: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api yāvat koṭiniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06psp_2-3u:239_3: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniṣadam apy upaniśām api na kṣamate.
S06psp_2-3u:240_0: tat kasya hetor? yāvad iyaṃ hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā jāmbūdvīpe sthāsyati tāvad na buddharatnasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati na dharmaratnasya na saṃgharatnasyāntardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:240_1: tāvad daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā loke bhaviṣyanti catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:240_2_2: āryasatyānāṃ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ catasṛṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:240_2_3: pratisaṃvidāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:240_2_6: yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo
S06psp_2-3u:240_2_7: bhavati yāvad akaniṣṭhānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_2-3u:240_3: srotaāpattiphalasya sakṛdāgāmiphalasyānāgāmiphalasyārhattvasya pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samudāgamo bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:240_4: anuttarasya buddhajñānasya dharmacakrapravartanasya sattvaparipākasya buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiś ca prajñāyate.
S06psp_2-3u:241_0: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:241_1: 69) devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrās tān śakro devānām indra āmantrayāmāsa:
S06psp_2-3u:241_2: udgrahītavyā mārṣāḥ prajñāpāramitā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā mārṣāḥ prajñāpāramitā yoniśo manasikartavyā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:242_0_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitāyā mārṣā udgrahītayā dhāritayā vācitayā paryavāptayā
S06psp_2-3u:242_0_1: sarve 'kuśalā dharmāḥ parihīyante kuśalā dharmā vivardhante divyāḥ kāyā vivardhante
S06psp_2-3u:242_1: prajñāpāramitāyā mārṣā udgṛhītayā dhārtitayā vācitayā paryavāptayā na buddhanetrī samucchidyate na dharmanetrī na saṃghanetrī samucchidyate,
S06psp_2-3u:242_2: triratnavaṃśānupacchedāya mārṣāḥ sarvāsāṃ pāramitānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_2-3u:242_3_1: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:242_3_2: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:242_4: sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ mārgākārajñatāyāḥ sarvajñatāyāḥ sarvākārajñatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06psp_2-3u:242_6: srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ loke prādurbhāvāḥ prajñāyante.
S06psp_2-3u:243_0: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:243_1: udgrahāṇa tvaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitāṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi tvaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitām.
S06psp_2-3u:244_0_0: tat kasya hetor? yadā kauśika asurāṇām evaṃ samudācārā bhaviṣyanti devais trāyastriṃśaiḥ
S06psp_2-3u:244_0_1: sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayiṣyāma iti tadā tvaṃ kauśika imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhareḥ svādhyāyeḥ
S06psp_2-3u:244_0_2: evaṃ teṣām asurāṇāṃ te samudācārā antardhāsyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:244_1: na ca punas tān vigrahacittotpādān utpādayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:244_2: yeṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇāṃ devakanyānāṃ vā cyutikālo bhavet teṣām api purataḥ svādhyāyaṃ kuryās,
S06psp_2-3u:244_3: te yady ātmano 'pāyopapattiṃ drakṣyanti teṣām enāṃ prajñāpārāmitāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ te 'pāyopapatticittotpādā antardhāsyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:244_4: tatraiva devabhavane te utpatsyante evaṃ maharddhikā hy asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravā yasya kasyacit kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:244_6: sarve te tena kuśalamūlenānupūrveṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:245_0: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:245_1: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugata tathā hi bhagavan ye 'tīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhūvan,
S06psp_2-3u:245_2: yeṣāṃ śrāvakā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau pratiṣṭhitās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:245_3: ye 'pi te bhagavan bhaviṣyanti anāgate 'dhvani buddhā bhagavantaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:245_4_0: ye 'pi caitarhi daśadiśi loke pratyutpanne 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā
S06psp_2-3u:245_4_1: bhagavantaḥ sa śrāvakasaṃghās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti sarve te ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:246_0: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarve buddhadharmā antargatāḥ sarve bodhisattvadharmāḥ sarve pratyekabuddhadharmāḥ sarve śrāvakadharmā antargatāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:247_0: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:247_1: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, mahāvidyeyaṃ kauśika yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:247_2: anuttareyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:247_3: asamasameyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:248_0_0: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi kauśika ye 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā daśadiśi loke tathāgatā
S06psp_2-3u:248_0_1: arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sarve te imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_2-3u:248_1: imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:248_2_0: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ sarvapāramitāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
S06psp_2-3u:248_2_2: sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
S06psp_2-3u:248_3_0: trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni aṣṭa vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ ṣaḍ abhijñā dharmadhātur
S06psp_2-3u:248_3_1: bhūtakoṭitathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā
S06psp_2-3u:248_6: bodhisattvaṃ punaḥ kauśikāgamya daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā loke prabhāvyante.
S06psp_2-3u:248_7_0: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo 'ṣṭa vimokṣā
S06psp_2-3u:248_7_1: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayas trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:248_7_2: sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ
S06psp_2-3u:248_8: dharmadhātur bhūtakoṭitathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā loke prajñāyate.
S06psp_2-3u:248_9: pañca cakṣūṃṣi srotaāpattiphalaṃ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmiphalam anāgāmī arhattvam arhan pratyekabodhiḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:248_10: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke prabhāvyate.
S06psp_2-3u:248_11: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika candramaṇḍalam āgamya sarvauṣadhītārāgaṇāḥ prabhāvyante.
S06psp_2-3u:248_12: evam eva kauśika bodhisattvacandramaṇḍalam āgamya daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:248_13: sarvakuśalacaryā samyakcaryā sarvapāramitāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:248_14: āryasatyāni aṣṭavimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ ṣaḍabhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhyoṣadhayaḥ prabhāvyante.
S06psp_2-3u:248_17: sarvajñatā prabhāvyate. tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prabhāvyante.
S06psp_2-3u:248_18: yadāpi buddhā bhagavanto loke nābhisaṃbudhyante notpādas tathāgatānāṃ bhavati,
S06psp_2-3u:248_20: sattvānāṃ laukikāṃś ca lokottarāṃś ca dharmān deśayanti.
S06psp_2-3u:249_2_0: yenopāyakauśalyena ṣaḍ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayati sarvasamādhīṃś
S06psp_2-3u:249_2_1: ca samāpadyate sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni ca pratilabhate apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīś
S06psp_2-3u:249_2_2: ca samāpadyate saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayati āryasatyāni bhāvayati aṣṭa
S06psp_2-3u:249_2_3: vimokṣān bhāvayati navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate abhijñā bhāvayati triṇi
S06psp_2-3u:249_3_0: 72) bhāvayati daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān
S06psp_2-3u:249_4: na ca śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā sākṣāt karoti.
S06psp_2-3u:249_5: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati bodhisattvasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇāti sarvajñatāṃ cānuprāpnoti.
S06psp_2-3u:250_0_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati
S06psp_2-3u:250_0_1: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati sa ebhiḥ dṛṣṭadhārmikair
S06psp_2-3u:251_0: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:251_1_0: katamair bhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā samanvāgatā
S06psp_2-3u:251_1_1: bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti
S06psp_2-3u:252_0_0: bhagavān āha: tena hi kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na viṣeṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:252_0_1: nāgninā na śastreṇa nodakena kālaṃ kariṣyanti yāvan na kenacid vyādhinā kālaṃ kariṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:252_0_2: sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākaṃ na ca rājakulād upadravā bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:252_1: sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyan rājakulaṃ praviśaty asyāvatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ na lapsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:253_0: tat kasya hetos? tathā hy asyā eva prajñāpāramitāyās tejasā.
S06psp_2-3u:253_1: sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyaṃs tatra rājakulam upasaṃkramiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:253_2: te cāsya tatra rājāno vā rājaputrā vā rājamahāmātrā vā pūrvam ālapitavyaṃ maṃsyante abhibhāṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:254_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarvasattvānām antike maitracittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ karuṇācittaṃ muditācittam upekṣācittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:254_1: ebhiḥ sa kauśika dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:254_2: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:255_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ebhiḥ sāṃparāyikair (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:255_2: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:255_3: yad uta na jātu daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ karmapathe 'virahito bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:255_4_0: na caturbhir dhyānair na caturbhir apramāṇair na catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhir na
S06psp_2-3u:255_4_1: pāramitābhir na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmair na satyair nāṣṭavimokṣair na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhir
S06psp_2-3u:255_4_2: na tribhir vimokṣamukhair nābhijñābhir na sarvaśūnyatābhir na sarvasamādhibhir na
S06psp_2-3u:255_4_3: sarvadhāraṇīmukhair na daśabhir balair na vaiśāradyair na pratisaṃvidbhir nāṣṭādaśabhir
S06psp_2-3u:255_7_0: na jātv indriyavikalo bhaviṣyati na jātv aṅgahīno bhaviṣyati na jātu daridrakuleṣūpapatsyate
S06psp_2-3u:255_7_1: na veṇukārakuleṣūpapatsyate na puṣkasakuleṣūpapatsyate na mauṣṭikakuleṣūpapatsyate
S06psp_2-3u:255_7_3: vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu vā udārodāreṣūpapatsyate.
S06psp_2-3u:255_8_1: bhaviṣyati yatra vā lokadhātau buddhā bhagavanto bhaviṣyanti tatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:255_11: tān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsituṃ dharmaṃ ca śrotuṃ buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāman sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_2-3u:256_0_0: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitā udgṛhītavyā dhārayitavyā
S06psp_2-3u:256_0_1: vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā sarvajñatācittena cāvirahitena
S06psp_2-3u:256_1: sa etair dṛṣṭadhārmikair guṇaiḥ sāṃparāyikair guṇair avirahito bhaviṣyati yāvan nānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbudhyate iti.
S06psp_2-3u:257_0: atha khalv anyatīrthikānāṃ parivrājakānāṃ śatam upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmati sma.
S06psp_2-3u:258_0: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:258_1: idam anyatīrthikānāṃ parivrājakānāṃ śatam upārambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmati,
S06psp_2-3u:258_2: yan nūnam ahaṃ yāvanmātraṃ mayā bhagavato 'ntikāt prajñāpāramitāyā udgrahītaṃ tāvanmātraṃ svādhyāyeyaṃ yad etad anyatīrthikānāṃ (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:258_3: 74) parivrājakānāṃ śataṃ na bhagavantam upasaṃkrāmeyur nāntarāyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kuryuḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:259_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indro yāvad anena bhagavato 'ntikāt prajñāpāramitāyā udgrahītaṃ tāvat svādhyāyati sma.
S06psp_2-3u:260_0: atha khalu te 'nyatīrthikāḥ parivrājakā dūrata eva bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yenaiva mārgeṇāgatās tenaiva pratigatāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:261_1: kim atra kāraṇaṃ yenaite 'nyatīrthikāḥ parivrājakā upārambhābhiprāyā bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yenaiva mārgeṇāgatās tenaiva pratigatāḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:262_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
S06psp_2-3u:262_1_0: śakreṇa śāriputra devānām indreṇa iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā samanvāhṛtā yenaite 'nyatīrthikāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:262_1_1: parivrājakā dūrata eva bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yenaiva mārgeṇāgatās tenaiva pratigatāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:262_1_2: na hi śāriputra teṣām anyatīrthikānāṃ parivrājakānām ekasyāpi śuklaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06psp_2-3u:262_2: sarva ete 'nyatīrthikāḥ parivrājakāḥ pratihatacittā upārambhābhiprāyā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06psp_2-3u:262_3: nāhaṃ taṃ śāriputra samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyām imāṃ prajñāpāramitām upārambhābhiprāyaḥ pratihatacitta upasaṃkrāmen,
S06psp_2-3u:263_0_0: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi śāriputra ya iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājikās
S06psp_2-3u:263_0_1: trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā
S06psp_2-3u:263_0_2: brahmapārṣadyā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrā ye 'pi śrāvakā ye 'pi pratyekabuddhā ye
S06psp_2-3u:263_0_3: 'pi bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tair apīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītā.
S06psp_2-3u:263_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te prajñāpāramitānirjātāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:264_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra ye 'pi te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
S06psp_2-3u:264_0_1: yāvad daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavantaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:264_1: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi te prajñāpāramitānirjātāḥ sarve.
S06psp_2-3u:265_0: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyasa etad abhavad:
S06psp_2-3u:265_1: imās tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya catasraḥ pariṣadaḥ saṃmukhaṃ sthitāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:265_2: amī ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrāḥ saṃmukhaṃ sthitā niḥsaṃśayam atra bodhisattvā (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:265_4: yan nūnam ahaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmeyaṃ vicakṣuḥkaraṇāyeti.
S06psp_2-3u:266_0: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyāṃś caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ nirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitukāmo bhavet.
S06psp_2-3u:267_0: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhavat:
S06psp_2-3u:267_1: māro batāyaṃ pāpīyāṃś caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ nirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitukāmaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:267_2: yo 'yaṃ mārasya pāpīyasaś caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpo vyūhaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:267_3: na rājño bimbisārasya caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpo vyūhaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:267_8: yo 'yaṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasyaivaṃrūpo māreṇa pāpīyasā nirmitaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:267_9: dīrgharātraṃ khalu punar māraḥ pāpīyān bhagavato 'vatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī sattvānāṃ ca viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:267_10: yan nūnam aham imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhareyaṃ smṛtyā svādhyāyaṃ kuryām.
S06psp_2-3u:268_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ prajñāparamitāṃ samanvājahāra smṛtyā svādhyāyam akarot,
S06psp_2-3u:268_1: yathā yathā śakro devānām indraḥ smṛtyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyati sma tathā tathā māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tenaiva mārgeṇa tenaiva dvāreṇa punar eva pratyudāvṛtto 'bhūt.
S06psp_2-3u:269_0: atha khalu ye 'syāṃ pariṣadi cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te divyāni puṣpāṇy abhinirmāyāntarīkṣagatā eva yena bhagavāṃs tenākṣipanti sma tenābhyavakiranti sma.
S06psp_2-3u:270_0_0: evaṃ ca vācam abhāṣanta: ciraṃ bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:270_0_1: pracaratu yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyānāṃ pracariṣyati tāvan
S06psp_2-3u:270_4: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvānāṃ caryāviśeṣaḥ prajñāsyate,
S06psp_2-3u:270_5: yatra ca digbhāge imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā likhitāṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti pustakalikhitām api kṛtvā sthāpayiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:270_7: 76) bhaviṣyati, sanāthā vigatatamondhakārā ca eṣā dig bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:271_0: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:271_1: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, yatra yatra diśi lokadhātuprasare iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pracariṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:271_2: pustakalikhitā ālokajātā ca eṣā dig bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:271_3: sanāthā vigatatamondhakārā ca eṣā dig bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:272_0: atha khalu te devaputrā divyāni kusumāny abhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenābhyavakiranti sma.
S06psp_2-3u:273_0_0: evaṃ ca vācam abhāṣanta: yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām
S06psp_2-3u:273_0_1: udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati na
S06psp_2-3u:273_0_2: tasya mārā vā mārakāyikā vā devaputrā avatāraṃ lapsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:273_1: vayam api bhagavaṃ tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:273_2: śāstāram iti bhagavaṃs taṃ vayaṃ kulaputraṃ vā kuladuhitaraṃ vā maṃsyāmahe ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:274_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:274_1: na te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vāvarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:274_2: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:274_3_0: pūrvajinakṛtādhikārās te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:274_3_1: prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca
S06psp_2-3u:274_4: bahubuddhaparyupāsitāḥ kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:275_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? ato nirjātā hi sarvajñatā yad uta prajñāpāramitā nirjātā sarvajñatā nirjātā ca prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:276_0: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi nānyā prajñāpāramitā nānyā sarvajñatā iti hi sarvajñatā ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:277_0: evam ukte bhagavān sakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:277_1: evam etat (PSP_2-3:77) kauśikaivam etat, yathā vadasi sarvajñatā ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:278_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:278_1_0: tathā hi bhagavān na dānapāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati na śīlapāramitāyā na
S06psp_2-3u:278_1_1: kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:278_4: nāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
S06psp_2-3u:278_5: na ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ na sarvāṇāṃ śūnyatānāṃ na samādhīnāṃ na sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati,
S06psp_2-3u:278_6: na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ na vaiśāradyānāṃ na pratisaṃvidāṃ nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati yathā prajñāpāramitāyā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayati.
S06psp_2-3u:279_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:279_1: prajñāpāramitā ānanda pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā yad uta ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā,
S06psp_2-3u:279_2: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā,
S06psp_2-3u:279_4: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā,
S06psp_2-3u:280_0: tat kiṃ manyase? ānanda apariṇāmitaṃ dānaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate.
S06psp_2-3u:281_0: tat kiṃ manyase? apariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ apariṇāmitā kṣāntir apariṇāmitaṃ vīryam apariṇāmitaṃ dhyānam apariṇāmitā prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate.
S06psp_2-3u:282_0: ānanda āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan no hīdaṃ sugata,
S06psp_2-3u:283_0: kathaṃ punar bhagavan dānaṃ sarvajñatāpariṇāmitaṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
S06psp_2-3u:284_0: kathaṃ punar bhagavan śīlaṃ kṣāntir vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmitā pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate?
S06psp_2-3u:285_0: bhagavān āha: advayayogenānanda dānaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntir vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmitā pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate.
S06psp_2-3u:285_1: anutpādayogenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitaṃ dānaṃ yāvat prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate.
S06psp_2-3u:286_0_0: ānanda āha: kathaṃ bhagavann advayayogena dānaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:286_0_1: labhate? evaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntir vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ kathaṃ bhagavan prajñādvayayogena pariṇāmitā
S06psp_2-3u:286_1: bhagavān āha: rūpasyānanda advayayogena vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyādvayayogena yāvad bodheḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:288_0: bhagavān āha: tathā hi ānanda rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ vedanā vedanayā śūnyā saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam.
S06psp_2-3u:289_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi rūpaṃ ca vedanā ca saṃjñā ca saṃskārā ca vijñānaṃ ca pāramitāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ yāvad bodhiś ca pāramitāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:289_1_0: tasmāt tarhy ānanda prajñāpāramitā nu pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:289_1_2: āryasatyānām aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:289_1_3: ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām
S06psp_2-3u:289_1_4: āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ yāvad bodheḥ sarvajñatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā.

S06psp_2-3u:293_0: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmeś cittaṃ vimuktaṃ,

S06psp_2-3u:308_0_1: āghrāsyati niṣṭhā tena gantavyā mahaujaskā mahaujaskā iha devaputrā āgatā iti prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:308_0_2: vācayituṃ śrotum udgrahītuṃ paryavāptuṃ dhārayituṃ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ
S06psp_2-3u:309_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā caukṣasamudācāro bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:309_1: tasya tayā caukṣasamudācāratayā devatā āgatyemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā āttamanaskā bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:309_2: yāś ca tatra pṛthivīpradeśe 'lpaujaskā alpaujaskā devatā bhaviṣyanti tās tato 'pakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:309_3: teṣāṃ mahaujaskānāṃ mahaujaskānāṃ devānāṃ tejaś ca śriyaś cāsahamānāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:309_4: yathāyathā mahaujaskā mahaujaskā devatā upasaṃkramiṣyanti tathātathā te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā udārādhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:309_6: puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacivaracchatradhvajapatākābhiś ca sa pṛthivīpradeśo 'laṃkartavyaḥ gandhalipto muktapuṣpāvakīrṇaḥ kārayitavyaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:310_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā kāyo na klānto bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:310_1: kāyasukhaṃ bhaviṣyati. kāyalaghutāṃ ca bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya pratipanno bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:310_2: sa ca kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kāyalaghutāṃ kāyakarmaṇyatāṃ kāyasukhatāṃ cittalaghutāṃ cittakarmaṇyatāṃ cittasukhatāṃ ca jñāsyati.
S06psp_2-3u:310_4: imāṃ eva prajñāpāramitām āśayena kalpayan na pāpakān svapnān drakṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:310_5_0: drakṣyaṃś ca punaḥ svapnena tathāgatān evārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān drakṣyati dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇacitritagātrān
S06psp_2-3u:310_8: tāsāṃ ca pāramitānām arthaṃ śroṣyati yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām arthaṃ śroṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:310_9: bodhivṛkṣaṃ drakṣyati. bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bodhimaṇḍam upasaṃkramamāṇaṃ drakṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:310_12: bahūni bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣyati dharmasaṃgītiratāni evaṃ sarvajñatā parigrahītavyā evaṃ sattvāḥ paripācayitavyā evaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayitavyam iti.
S06psp_2-3u:310_13: bahunāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśataśahasrāṇāṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi śabdaṃ śroṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:311_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adho vidikṣu bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:311_1: amuṣmin lokadhātau amuko nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ iyadbhir bodhisattvakoṭīśatasahasrair iyadbhiḥ śrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_2-3u:311_2: pūrvasyāṃ diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣyati parinirvāyamāṇāni yāvad daśasu dikṣu bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣyati parinirvāyamāṇāni.
S06psp_2-3u:311_3: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ stūpān dhātudharān nānāratnamayān bahūni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:311_4: tāṃś ca stūpān satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:312_0: sa khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imān evaṃrūpān bhadrakāṃś ca svapnān drakṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:312_1: sa sukham eva svapsyati sukhaṃ ca pratibhotsyate ojaḥprakṣiptaṃ ca kāyaṃ saṃjñāsyati.
S06psp_2-3u:312_2: laghuṃ ca kāyaṃ saṃjñāsyati na guruṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:312_3: na cāsya balavatī gṛddhir āhāre bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:312_5: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika yogācārasya bhikṣoḥ samādher vyutthitasya manasikārasaṃtarpitena cittena na balavaty āhāre gṛddhir bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:313_0: evam eva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na balavaty āhāre gṛddhir bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:314_0: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi tasyāmanuṣyā ojaḥ kāya upasaṃharanti.
S06psp_2-3u:314_1: ye cāpi (PSP_2-3:87) daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas te 'pi sadevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragāḥ ojaḥ kāye prakṣipanti.
S06psp_2-3u:314_2_0: imaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigṛhṇīte ya imāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:314_2_1: prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīte paryavāpnoti dhārayati vācayati yoniśaś ca manasikaroti
S06psp_2-3u:315_0_0: kiṃ cāpi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nodgṛhṇīyān na dhārayen
S06psp_2-3u:315_0_1: na vācayen na paryavāpnuyān na yoniśaś ca manasikuryān na parebhyaś ca saṃprakāśayed
S06psp_2-3u:315_0_2: api tu khalu punaḥ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:316_0_0: yaś ca kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed
S06psp_2-3u:316_0_1: vācayet paryavāpnuyād yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt parebhyaś ca saṃprakāśayet tāṃ ca likhitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:316_0_3: ayaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tato nidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_2-3u:317_0_0: na tv eva yaḥ samantād daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān
S06psp_2-3u:317_0_2: parinirvṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:317_1: tāṃś ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:318_0: iti parārthādhimuktir mṛdumṛddhi stūpasatkāraparivarto nāma tṛtīyaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:319_0: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:319_1: yady ayaṃ kauśika jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddhas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ bhavet,
S06psp_2-3u:319_2: tāni te kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā upanāmayed,
S06psp_2-3u:319_4: tatas tvaṃ tayor dvayor bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ kaṃ parigṛhṇīyāḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:320_0: śakra āha: saced me bhagavann ayaṃ jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddhas tathāgataśarīrāṇām upanāmyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:320_1: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā upanāmyeta parikalpam upādāya imām evāhaṃ tayor dvayor (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:320_3: tat kasya hetor? na mama bhagavaṃs teṣu tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:320_4: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgataśarirāṇi na satkartukāmo na gurukartukāmo na mānayitukāmo na pūjayitukāmo.
S06psp_2-3u:320_5: api tu khalu punar me bhagavann evaṃ syāt prajñāpāramitānirjātāni tathāgataśarirāṇi yena tāni satkriyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjyante,
S06psp_2-3u:320_6: prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi yena tāni pūjāṃ labhante.
S06psp_2-3u:321_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:321_1: prajñāpāramitā kauśika agrāhyā anidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇā.
S06psp_2-3u:321_2: tat kathaṃ tvam agrāhyāṃ prajñāpāramitām anidarśanām apratighām ekalakṣaṇāṃ yad utālakṣaṇām udgrahītavyāṃ manyase?
S06psp_2-3u:322_0: tat kasya hetor? na hi prajñāpāramitā grahāya anugrahāya vā sthitā,
S06psp_2-3u:322_1: na hānāya na vṛddhaye notkṣepāya na vikṣepāya na saṃkleśāya na vyavadānāya,
S06psp_2-3u:322_2: na buddhadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā, na pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ cchorikā,
S06psp_2-3u:322_3: na bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ na pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ na śrāvakadharmāṇāṃ na śaikṣadharmāṇāṃ nāśaikṣadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā,
S06psp_2-3u:322_4: na saṃskṛtadhāto dāyikā, nāsaṃskṛtadhāto dāyikā, nādhyātmaśūnyatāyā yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā dātrī,
S06psp_2-3u:323_0: śakra āha: evam etad bhadanta śāriputra yathā vadasi na prajñāpāramitā buddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī yāvan na sarvajñatāyā dātrī.
S06psp_2-3u:323_1: tat kasya hetor? na hi prajñāpāramitā dvayaṃ pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_2-3u:323_2: advayā hi prajñāpāramitā, evaṃ dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:324_0: atha khalu bhagavān śakrasya devānām indrasya sādhukāram adāt:
S06psp_2-3u:324_1: sādhu sādhu kauśika evam etad yathā nirdiśasi na prajñāpāramitā dvayaṃ pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_2-3u:324_2: advayā hi prajñāpāramitā, evaṃ dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:324_3: kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā, dānapāramitā na dvayaṃ pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_2-3u:325_0: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet.
S06psp_2-3u:325_1: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca prajñāpāramitā (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:325_3: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā ca vīryapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca,
S06psp_2-3u:325_4: dharmadhātuś ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:326_0: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet,
S06psp_2-3u:326_1: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_2-3u:326_2: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā ca vīryapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca,
S06psp_2-3u:326_3: tathatā ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:327_0: bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet,
S06psp_2-3u:327_1: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś cācintyadhātuś ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06psp_2-3u:327_2: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā ca vīryapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca,
S06psp_2-3u:327_3: bhūtakoṭiś cācintyadhātuś ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:328_0: śakra āha: namaskaromi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena namaskṛtāṃ yatra śikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06psp_2-3u:328_1: yadāhaṃ bhagavan sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ tasmin devendrāsane niṣaṇṇo bhavāmi svake āsane tatra ye devaputrā mamopasthānāyāgacchanti te māṃ tatra sthaṃ namasyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:328_2: yadāhaṃ tatra na bhavāmi svake siṃhāsane tadā te devaputrās tat mamāsanaṃ namaskṛtya punar eva prakrāmanti,
S06psp_2-3u:328_3: iha śakro devānām indro dharmāsane niṣaṇṇas trāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmāseti.
S06psp_2-3u:329_0: evam eva bhagavan yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā likhitvā sthāsyate svādhyāsyate vā parebhyo vā saṃprakāśayiṣyate,
S06psp_2-3u:329_1: tatra ye te daśabhyo digbhyo devaputrā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragās te tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ namaskṛtya punar eva prakramiṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:329_4: yad api tathāgataśarīrāṇi tad api prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitatvāt pūjāṃ pratilabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:330_0: tasmād ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pratyaṃśābhyāṃ prajñāpāramitām eva parigṛhṇīyām.
S06psp_2-3u:330_1: imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya svādhyāyaṃ kuryān dharmāntargatena mānasena yasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ manasikaromi (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:330_2: 90) tasmin samaye bhagavan nimittam eva na samanupaśyāmi bhayasya vā stambhitatvasya vā.
S06psp_2-3u:330_3: tat kasya hetor? animittā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā aliṅgā anabhilapyā,
S06psp_2-3u:330_6: animittā hi bhagavan dānapāramitā aliṅgā anabhilapyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan dānapāramitā yāvat sarvajñatā,
S06psp_2-3u:330_7_0: saced bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sanimittā saliṅgā sābhilapyā sapravyāhārābhaviṣyan
S06psp_2-3u:330_7_1: nānimittā nāliṅgā nānabhilapyā nāpravyāhārā naiva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:330_7_2: sarvadharmān animittān aliṅgān anabhilapyān apravyāhārān iti viditvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_2-3u:330_7_3: abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām animittam aliṅgam anabhilapyam apravyāhāraṃ dharmam adeśayiṣyat,
S06psp_2-3u:330_8_0: yasmād bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā animittā aliṅgā anabhilapyā apravyāhārā tasmāt
S06psp_2-3u:330_8_1: tathāgataḥ sarvadharmān animittān aliṅgān anabhilapyān apravyāhārān viditvā anuttarāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:330_8_2: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām animittam aliṅgam anabhilapyam apravyāhāraṃ
S06psp_2-3u:331_0: tasmād bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacivaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:331_2: na śrāvakabhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:331_3: avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyati tathāgatadarśanena sattvaparipākena yad uta buddhakṣetram upasaṃkrāmati,
S06psp_2-3u:331_4: tāṃś ca tathāgatān satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:332_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yady ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddho 'pi me upanāmyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:332_1: imāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitaṃ kṛtvā upanāmyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:332_2: aham anayor dvayor bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayor imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyāṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:332_3: tat kasya hetor? ato nirjātāni hi tathāgataśarīrāṇi.
S06psp_2-3u:332_4: tena satkriyante gurukriyante mānayante pūjyante yena te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca tāni satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā na durgativinipāteṣūpapadyante,
S06psp_2-3u:332_5: devamanuṣyasaṃpattīr anubhūya yathāpraṇidhānena nirvāsyanti śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:332_6: 91) vā. api tu khalu punar bhagavan yac ca tathāgatadarśanaṃ yac ca prajñāpāramitādarśanaṃ tulyam etat,
S06psp_2-3u:332_7: tathā hi bhagavan yā prajñāpāramitā yaś ca tathāgato 'dvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06psp_2-3u:333_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yaś ca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tribhiḥ prātihāryair dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06psp_2-3u:333_1: yad uta dvādaśāṅgaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yāvad avadānopadeśā,
S06psp_2-3u:333_2: yaś ca sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya parebhyaś ca vistareṇa deśayeta tulyam etat.
S06psp_2-3u:333_3: tat kasya hetor? ato nirjātāni hi bhagavaṃs trīṇi prātihāryāṇi,
S06psp_2-3u:333_4: tato nirjātaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yāvad avadānopadeśāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:334_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan ye pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti yad uta sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yāvad avadānopadeśāḥ tribhiḥ prātihāryair,
S06psp_2-3u:334_1_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adho yāvad vidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālkopameṣu
S06psp_2-3u:334_1_1: lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti tribhiḥ prātihāryair yad uta sūtraṃ
S06psp_2-3u:334_2: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyāt yāvat parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayet tulyam etat.
S06psp_2-3u:334_3: tat kasya hetor? ato nirjātāni hi bhagavaṃs trīṇi prātihāryāṇi.
S06psp_2-3u:334_4: tato nirjātaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yāvad avadānopādeśāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:335_0_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yaś caikaikasyāṃ diśi yāvanto daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu
S06psp_2-3u:335_0_1: gaṅgānadīvālukopamās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tān satkuryād gurukuryāt
S06psp_2-3u:335_1: yaś cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā satkuryād gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhis tulyam etat.
S06psp_2-3u:335_2: tat kasya hetor? ato nirjātā hi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:336_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:336_3: pratikāṅkṣitavyā na śrāvakabhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
S06psp_2-3u:336_4: tathā hi sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthito 'vinivartanīyāyāṃ bhūmau.
S06psp_2-3u:336_5_0: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā
S06psp_2-3u:336_5_1: udgṛhṇāti dhārayati vācayati paryavāpnoti yoniśaś ca manasikaroti tāṃ ca likhitāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:336_7: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dhanikabhayabhītaḥ puruṣo rājānam upatiṣṭhet,
S06psp_2-3u:336_8: sa rājānaṃ sevamāno yebhya evāsya bhayaṃ bhavati tair eva sevyate na ca tebhyo bibheti.
S06psp_2-3u:336_9: tat kasya hetor? evam etat bhagavan balavati niśraye bhayaṃ na bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:336_10: evam eva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante.
S06psp_2-3u:336_11: tatra bhagavan yathā sa rājā evaṃ prajñāpāramitā draṣṭavyā,
S06psp_2-3u:336_12: yathā sa rājaniḥśritaḥ puruṣaḥ pūjāṃ labhate.
S06psp_2-3u:336_13: evam eva tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni pūjāṃ labhante.
S06psp_2-3u:336_14: yad api bhagavaṃs tat sarvajñajñānaṃ tad api prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:336_15: tasmāt tayor dvayor bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ pratyaṃśam imām evāhaṃ prajñārapāmitāṃ parigṛhṇīyāṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:336_16: tat kasya hetor? ato nirjātāni hi tathāgataśarīrāṇi,
S06psp_2-3u:336_18: ato nirjātāni daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:336_20: ato nirjātāḥ pañca pāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante,
S06psp_2-3u:337_0_0: yatra bhagavaṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti
S06psp_2-3u:337_0_1: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti tatra teṣāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:337_0_2: sattvānāṃ manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ na lapsyante,
S06psp_2-3u:337_1: sarve ca te sattvā anupūrveṇa parinirvāṇadharmāṇo bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:337_3: yatra hi nāma bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ye sattvās teṣāṃ buddhakṛtyena pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_2-3u:337_4: buddhotpādo (PSP_2-3:93) bhagavaṃs tatra lokadhātau pratikāṅkṣitavyo yatra lokadhātau iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pracariṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:337_5: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavann anarghaṃ yat maṇiratnaiḥ bhavet tat khalu punar mahāmaṇiratnam ebhir eva guṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ bhavet.
S06psp_2-3u:337_6: yatrayatra tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tatratatrāmanuṣyā avatāraṃ na labhante.
S06psp_2-3u:337_7_0: yatrayatra cāmanuṣyagṛhītaḥ strī vā puruṣo vā bhavet tatratatra tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:337_7_1: praveṣyeta praveśitamātra eva tasmin mahāmaṇiratne so 'manuṣyaḥ prakrāmet tasya mahāmaṇiratnasya
S06psp_2-3u:337_8: pittena vā dahyamāne śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tad api pittaṃ nigṛhṇīyān na vivardhetopaśāmyeta.
S06psp_2-3u:337_9: vātābhibhūte vā śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tam api vātaṃ nigṛhṇīyāt.
S06psp_2-3u:337_10: śleṣmaṇā upastabdhe śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta taṃ sarvaṃ śleṣmāṇaṃ praśamayet.
S06psp_2-3u:337_11: saṃnipātābhibhūte vā śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā purataḥ sthāpyeta tasyāpi sa vyādhir upaśāmyeta.
S06psp_2-3u:337_13: uṣṇakāle ca vartamāne yatra pṛthivīpradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta sa pṛthivīpradeśaḥ śiśiraḥ parivarteta.
S06psp_2-3u:337_14: śiśirakāle 'pi vartamāne yatra pṛthivīpradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta sa pṛthivīpradeśo gharmaḥ parivarteta.
S06psp_2-3u:337_15: yatra ca tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta sa ca pṛthivīpradeśo nātyuṣṇo nātiśītaḥ syāt ṛtusukho.
S06psp_2-3u:338_0: yatra pṛthivīpradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratṇaṃ tiṣṭhati tatra pṛthivīpradeśe nāśīviṣā upavicaranti vṛścikādīni vā sarīsṛpāṇi vā,
S06psp_2-3u:338_1: yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā āśīviṣeṇa daṣṭo bhavet tasyāpi tan mahāmaṇiratnam upadarśyeta tasya saha darśanenaiva tad viṣaṃ vigacchet.
S06psp_2-3u:338_2: ebhir evam ādibhir guṇair yuktaṃ tat mahāmaṇiratnaṃ bhaved,
S06psp_2-3u:338_3: ye 'pi bhagavan striyo vā puruṣā vā nānāvyādhiparigatā bhavanti teṣām api kāye tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:338_4: teṣām api sarve te vyādhaya upaśamaṃ gaccheyuḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:338_5: yatrāpi bhagavann udake tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tad api sarvam (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:338_7: saced bhagavaṃs tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ nīlena vāsasā pariveṣṭya udake prakṣipet tad udakaṃ nīlaṃ kuryāt.
S06psp_2-3u:338_8: sacet pītakena sacel lohitakena vastreṇa saced māñjiṣṭhavarṇena sacet sphaṭikavarṇena vastreṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvā udake prakṣipyeta tad varṇam udakaṃ bhavet.
S06psp_2-3u:338_9: nānāraṅgaraktair api vastrais tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvā udake prakṣipyeta tad udakaṃ nānāvarṇaṃ kuryāt.
S06psp_2-3u:338_10: yatra ca bhagavann udake kaluṣe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tat sarvam udakaṃ prasādayed ebhir evam ādibhir guṇaiḥ samupetaṃ tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet.
S06psp_2-3u:339_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānandaḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:339_1: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśika divyaṃ tan mahāmaṇiratnam utāho jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇām etad mahāmaṇiratnaṃ vidyate.
S06psp_2-3u:340_0: śakra āha: divyaṃ tad bhadanta mahāmaṇiratnaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:340_1: yāni jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnāni tāni parīttāni gurūṇi ca,
S06psp_2-3u:340_2: yāni punar divyāni tāni mahānti laghūni ca,
S06psp_2-3u:340_3_0: tair ākārais tathā suparipūrṇāni jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnāni yathā na
S06psp_2-3u:340_3_1: suparipūrṇāni punar jāmbūdvīpakāni maṇiratnāni divyānāṃ maṇiratnānāṃ saṃkhyām api
S06psp_2-3u:340_3_2: nopayānti kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām api nopayānti.
S06psp_2-3u:340_4: tat khalu mahāmaṇiratnaṃ yasmin karaṇḍake tiṣṭhati yadā tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ tasmāt karaṇḍakād utkṣiptaṃ bhavati spṛhaṇīyaḥ sa karaṇḍako bhavati,
S06psp_2-3u:340_5: atra tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthitam abhūd iti.
S06psp_2-3u:341_0_0: evam etad bhadantānanda yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pṛthivīpradeśe pracariṣyati na tatra
S06psp_2-3u:341_0_1: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā kāyikā vā caitasikā vā duḥkhopadravā manuṣyakṛtā vā
S06psp_2-3u:341_1: mahāmaṇiratnam iti prajñāpāramitāyā etad adhivacanaṃ sarvajñajñānasya ca.
S06psp_2-3u:341_2: kiyantaḥ śakyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā guṇāḥ? parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi prajñāpāramitāyā guṇāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:341_3_0: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā kṣāntipāramitāyā śīlapāramitāyā dānapāramitāyā
S06psp_2-3u:341_4_2: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām
S06psp_2-3u:341_4_3: āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ sarvajñajñānasyāpi dharmadhātor api dharmaniyāmatāyās
S06psp_2-3u:341_4_4: tathatāyā bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātoḥ sarvajñajñānasyaite guṇā yena parinirvṛtasyāpi
S06psp_2-3u:341_5_1: eṣāṃ tathāgataśarirāṇi bhājanabhūtāny abhūvaṃs tenaitāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:342_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:342_1: ratnapāramitāyā bhagavann imāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam abhūt.
S06psp_2-3u:342_2: asaṃkleśāvyavadānapāramitāyā anutpādānirodhapāramitāyā anāgatipāramitāyā imāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:343_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavaṃs tiṣṭhatu trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaś cūḍikābaddhaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:343_1: saced bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇāś cūḍikābaddhā bhaveyur,
S06psp_2-3u:343_2: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā upanāmyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:343_3: tayor ahaṃ bhagavan dvayor bhāgayoḥ sthāpitayor imām eva prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyāṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:343_4: tat kasya hetor? ato nirjātāni hi tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni pūjāṃ labhante.
S06psp_2-3u:344_0_0: yaḥ punar bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryāt
S06psp_2-3u:344_0_1: mānayet pūjayet sa tasya kuśalamūlasya parittīkṛtāni divyāni mānuṣyakāṇi ca sukhāni
S06psp_2-3u:344_0_2: pratyanubhūya kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu
S06psp_2-3u:344_0_3: vā cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu vā trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu
S06psp_2-3u:344_0_4: deveṣu sukhaṃ pratyanubhūya tena kuśalamūlena duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:345_0: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvato yoniśaś ca manasikurvato dhyānapāramitā (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:345_1_0: 96) paripūryate dhyānapāramitā paripūrṇā vīryapāramitā paripūryate vīryapāramitā
S06psp_2-3u:345_1_1: paripūrṇā kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate kṣāntipāramitā paripurṇā śīlaparamitā paripūryate
S06psp_2-3u:345_1_2: śīlapāramitā paripūrṇā dānapāramitā paripūryate dānapāramitā paripūrṇā.
S06psp_2-3u:345_2: evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ paripūryante,
S06psp_2-3u:345_3: so 'tikramya śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya bodhisattvābhijñāḥ pratilabhya buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:345_6_0: yadi vā cakravartyātmabhāvaṃ paigṛhya kṣatriya mahāśālakulātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhya brāhmaṇa
S06psp_2-3u:345_6_1: mahāśālakulātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhya gṛhapatimahāśālakulātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhya sattvān paripācayiṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:345_7: tasmād bhagavan na me tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravam eva me bhagavan nāpi na grahītukāmaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:345_8: api tu khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitayā satkṛtayā gurukṛtayā mānitayā pūjitayā tathāgataśarīrāṇy api satkṛtāni bhavanti gurukṛtāni mānitāni pūjitāni bhavanti.
S06psp_2-3u:346_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan ye daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti.
S06psp_2-3u:346_1_0: tāṃś ca dharmakāyena ca rūpakāyena ca draṣṭukāmena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā
S06psp_2-3u:346_1_1: dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā yoniśaś
S06psp_2-3u:346_2: sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tān daśasu dikṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān icched draṣṭuṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:346_3: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā buddhānusmṛtir bhāvayitavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:347_0: dharmatayā dve ime bhagavatāṃ dharmate. katame dve? yad uta saṃskṛtadharmatā cāsaṃskṛtadharmatā ca.
S06psp_2-3u:348_0_0: tatra bhagavan katamā saṃskṛtadharmatā? yad utādhyātmaśūnyatājñānaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatājñānam
S06psp_2-3u:348_0_2: dharmeṣu yad āryasatyeṣu yad apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu yad daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu
S06psp_2-3u:348_1: yac caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:348_2: 97) jñānaṃ, yat kuśalamūleṣu sāsravānāsraveṣu sāvadyānavadyeṣu laukikalokottareṣu saṃkleśavyavadānadharmeṣu jñānam iyam ucyate saṃskṛtadharmatā.
S06psp_2-3u:349_0: tatra katamā asaṃskṛtadharmā ucyate? yasya dharmasya notpādo na nirodho na sthitir nāsthiḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:349_1: nānyathātvaṃ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ na hānir na vṛddhiḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:349_3_0: katamā sarvadharmāṇām abhāvasvabhāvatā? yā adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā
S06psp_2-3u:349_3_1: śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā atyantaśūnyatā
S06psp_2-3u:349_4: yat sarvadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatātvam anupalambho yāvad yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirabhilapyatā apravyāhāratā iyam ucyate asaṃskṛtadharmatā.
S06psp_2-3u:350_0: atha khalu bhagavān sakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:350_1: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:350_2: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:350_3_0: ye 'py etarhi daśadiglokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante
S06psp_2-3u:350_3_1: yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_2-3u:350_4: ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atītānāgatāḥ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbhotsyante,
S06psp_2-3u:350_6: ye 'pi sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāpsyante prāpnuvanti ca.
S06psp_2-3u:350_7: ye 'pi te daśadiśi loke 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu śrāvakā,
S06psp_2-3u:350_8: ye ca pratyekabuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya śrāvakabodhipratyekabodhiprāptās.
S06psp_2-3u:350_12: tat punar lokavyavahāreṇa na punaḥ paramārthena.
S06psp_2-3u:350_13_0: tat kasya hetor? na hi prajñāpāramitāyām apāraṃ vā pāraṃ vā sthalaṃ vā nimnaṃ vā
S06psp_2-3u:350_13_1: samaṃ vā viṣamaṃ vā nimittaṃ vā animittaṃ vā laukikaṃ vā lokottaraṃ vā saṃskṛtaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:350_13_2: vā asaṃskṛtaṃ vā kuśalaṃ vā akuśalaṃ vā atītaṃ vā anāgataṃ vā pratyutpannaṃ vā prajñāyate.
S06psp_2-3u:350_14: na ca kauśika prajñāpāramitā kasyacid dharmasya pradāyikā na pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ nārhatvadharmāṇāṃ pradāyikā.
S06psp_2-3u:351_0: śakra āha: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:351_1: atra hi bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ sarvasattvacittacaritāni prajānanti na ca sattvam upalabhante,
S06psp_2-3u:351_2: na jīvaṃ na poṣaṃ na puruṣaṃ na manujaṃ na mānavaṃ na kārakaṃ na vedakaṃ na jānakaṃ na paśyakam upalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:351_3: na rūpam upalabhante, na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānam upalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:351_5: nābdhātuṃ na tejodhātuṃ na vāyudhātuṃ nākāśadhātuṃ na vijñānadhātum upalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:351_6: na cakṣur upalabhante, na rūpam upalabhante, na cakṣurvijñānam upalabhante,
S06psp_2-3u:351_8: yad api tac cakṣūrūpasaṃsparśapratyayād utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nopalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:351_9: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvāṃ kāyaṃ mano nopalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:351_12: śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ yāvan manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ nopalabhante yāvad yad api tan manodharmasaṃsparśapratyayād utpadyate vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā tad api nopalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:351_16: nāryasatyāni nāṣṭavimokṣān na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr na ṣaḍabhijñā upalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:351_17: (PSP_2-3:99) na daśatathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān upalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:351_19: na bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatām upalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:351_22: na bodhiṃ na buddhaṃ na buddhadharmān upalabhante.
S06psp_2-3u:351_24: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi svabhāvo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06psp_2-3u:352_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat, tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupalambhayogena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhim api nopalabhate prāg eva bodhisattvadharmān.
S06psp_2-3u:353_0: śakra āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām eva carati nānyāsu pāramitāsu?
S06psp_2-3u:354_0: bhagavān āha: sarvāsu kauśika pāramitāsu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati na kevalaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ.
S06psp_2-3u:354_1: tac cānupalambhayogena sa dānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate dāyakam api nopalabhate pratigrāhakam api nopalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:354_2: śīlapāramitāṃ nopalabhate śīlavantam api nopalabhate dauḥśīlyam api nopalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:354_3: kṣāntipāramitāṃ nopalabhate kṣamiṇam api nopalabhate kṣamyam api nopalabhate vīryapāramitāṃ nopalabhate kartavyam api nopalabhate kāyacittam api nopalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:354_4: dhyānapāramitāṃ nopalabhate cittam api nopalabhate samādhim api nopalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:354_5: prajñāpāramitāṃ nopalabhate prajñāvantam api nopalabhate prajñayam api nopalabhate.
S06psp_2-3u:354_6: api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ dadataḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:354_7_0: prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlaṃ rakṣataḥ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayato
S06psp_2-3u:354_7_1: vīryam ārambhamāṇasya dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasya dharmān vibhāvayato bodhisattvasya
S06psp_2-3u:354_7_2: mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā sarvadharmāṇām anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:354_11: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:354_12: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām anupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:354_15: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ nānāpatrapalāśānāṃ nānāpuṣpaphalānāṃ nānārohasaṃsthānapariṇāhānāṃ na ca teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ cchāyāyā viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ copalabhyate,
S06psp_2-3u:354_16: api tu cchāyā cchāyeti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
S06psp_2-3u:354_17: evam eva kauśika pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītānāṃ sarvajñātāpariṇāmitānāṃ na viśeṣo na nānākaraṇam upalabhyate 'nupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:354_18: iti parārthādhimuktir adhimātrādhimātrety ukto adhimuktimanaskāraḥ guṇaparikīrtanaparivarto nāma caturthaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:355_0: śakra āha: mahāguṇasamanvāgatā bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:355_1: sarvaguṇaparipūraṇī aprameyaguṇasamanvāgatā acintyaguṇasamanvāgatā atulyaguṇasamanvāgatā aparimāṇaguṇasamanvāgatā aparyantaguṇasamanvāgateyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:355_2: yaḥ kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitām api kṛtvā dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati,
S06psp_2-3u:355_3: tāṃ ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhir yathopadiṣṭāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ yoniśo manasikuryād,
S06psp_2-3u:355_4: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parasmai dadyāt,
S06psp_2-3u:356_0: bhagavān āha: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra pratiprakṣyāmi yathā te kṣamate tathā vyākuryāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:356_1_0: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśika, yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi
S06psp_2-3u:356_2: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sarṣapaphalamātrakaṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ parasmai dadyāt saṃvibhāgaṃ kuryāt,
S06psp_2-3u:356_3: so 'pi kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tat sarṣapaphalamātrakaṃ (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:357_0: śakra āha: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājāneyāyaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi svayaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed arcayed apacāyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:357_1: so 'pi sarṣapaphalamātrakaṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ parasmai dādyād ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_2-3u:357_2_0: evam arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyamānena tathāgatena vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya ātmabhāvaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:357_2_1: vajropamaṃ bhittvā tathāgataśarīrāṇy adhiṣṭhitāni mahākaruṇāṃ saṃjanaya sattvakāye
S06psp_2-3u:357_3_0: tat kasya hetor? ye kecid bhagavan tathāgatasya parinirvṛttasyāntaśaḥ sarṣapaphalamātrakam
S06psp_2-3u:357_3_1: api dhātuṃ pūjayiṣyanti sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ na śakyaṃ tasya kuśalamūlasya paryanto 'dhigantuṃ
S06psp_2-3u:358_0_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:358_0_1: prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyaty arcayiṣyaty apacāyiṣyate
S06psp_2-3u:358_1: parasmai ca likhitvā dadyād evaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati.
S06psp_2-3u:359_0_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathopadiṣṭāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:359_0_1: parebhyo gatvā ācakṣīta deśayet prakāśayed vibhajed uttānīkuryād ayaṃ sa kulaputro
S06psp_2-3u:359_0_2: vā kuladuhitā vā tataḥ pūrvakāt kulaputrād vā kuladuhitur vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati.
S06psp_2-3u:359_3: tat kasya hetor? eṣa evātra śāstā draṣṭavyo yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na hy anyaḥ śāstā anyā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:359_4_0: prajñāpāramitaiva śāstā, śāstaiva prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetor? atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:359_4_1: śikṣitvā kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā atītānāgatapratyutpannās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā
S06psp_2-3u:359_6: te 'pi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:359_7: 102) abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. atraiva kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śrāvakāḥ śikṣitāḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:359_9: bodhisattvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmanti avakrāntāś ca avakramiṣyanti ca.
S06psp_2-3u:359_10_0: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān
S06psp_2-3u:359_11: iyam eva prajñāpāramitā pustakalikhitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatra dhvajapatākābhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:359_12: imam api cārthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyamānasya mamānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhasyaitad abhūt;
S06psp_2-3u:359_13: kan nv ahaṃ dharmam upaniśritya vihareyaṃ satkuryāṃ gurukuryāṃ mānayeyaṃ pūjayeyam iti.
S06psp_2-3u:359_14: so 'haṃ kauśika yadā nādrākṣaṃ sadevake loke sabrahmake samārake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāṃ sadṛśam.
S06psp_2-3u:359_15: tasya me sadṛśaṃ samanupaśyamānasya etad abhūt;
S06psp_2-3u:359_16: yan nūnam ahaṃ ya eva mayā dharmābhisaṃbuddhas tam eva dharmaṃ satkuryāṃ gurukuryāṃ mānayeyaṃ pūjayeyam iti,
S06psp_2-3u:359_18: ayam eva kauśika saddharmo yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:359_19: aham eva kauśika imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkaromi gurukaromi mānayāmi pūjayāmi satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā upaniśrāya ca viharāmi.
S06psp_2-3u:359_20_0: kiṃ vā punaḥ kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena
S06psp_2-3u:359_20_1: iyam eva prajñāpāramitā na satkartavyā na gurukartavyā na mānayitavyā na pūjayitavyā
S06psp_2-3u:359_21_0: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikaiḥ kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir
S06psp_2-3u:359_21_1: vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:359_22: tat kasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi bodhisattvā,
S06psp_2-3u:359_25: tasmāt tarhi kauśika mahāyānikaiḥ kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā śrāvakayānikaiś ca iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:359_27: yatra śikṣitvā kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:360_0: ekaṃ kauśika sattvaṃ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpya aprameyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06psp_2-3u:360_1: na tv eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya.
S06psp_2-3u:360_2: tat kasya hetor? daśasu kauśika kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu sattvāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā aparimuktā eva nirayatiryagyoniyamalokāsuragatibhyaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:360_3: srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ punaḥ sarvadurgatibhyo mukto bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:361_0: sakṛdāgāmiphale evaṃ sattvaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06psp_2-3u:361_1: na tv eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya.
S06psp_2-3u:362_0: evam anāgāmiphale ekaṃ sattvaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06psp_2-3u:362_1: na tv eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya.
S06psp_2-3u:363_0: evam ekaṃ sattvam arhattve pratiṣṭhāpya bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06psp_2-3u:363_1: na tv eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya.
S06psp_2-3u:364_0: evam ekaṃ sattvaṃ pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpya bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06psp_2-3u:364_1: na tv eva jāmbudvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya.
S06psp_2-3u:365_0: yaḥ kaścit kauśika kulaputro vās kuladuhitā vā jāmbudvīpakān sattvān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06psp_2-3u:365_1: yo vānyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ekaṃ sattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati.
S06psp_2-3u:365_2: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi buddhanetryāḥ so 'nupacchedāya pratyupasthito bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:366_0: evaṃ yaḥ sarvajāmbudvīpakān sattvān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed,
S06psp_2-3u:366_1: yo vānya ekaṃ sattvam anuttarāyāṃ sanyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati.
S06psp_2-3u:367_0: evaṃ yaḥ sarvajāmbudvīpakān sattvān anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed,
S06psp_2-3u:367_1: yo vānya ekaṃ sattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati.
S06psp_2-3u:368_0: evaṃ yaḥ sarvajāmbudvīpakān sattvān arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayed,
S06psp_2-3u:368_1: yo vānya ekaṃ sattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati.
S06psp_2-3u:369_0: evaṃ yaḥ sarvajāmbudvīpakān sattvān pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed,
S06psp_2-3u:369_1: yo vānyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ekaṃ sattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati.
S06psp_2-3u:369_2: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi buddhanetryāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:369_4: ya ekaṃ sattvam apy anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet.
S06psp_2-3u:369_5: tat kasya hetor? bodhisattvanirjātā hi kauśika yāvantas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ.

S06psp_2-3u:388_7_2: caritasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na dānapāramitā paripūryate,
S06psp_2-3u:388_8: na śīlapāramitā na kṣāntipāramitā na vīryapāramitā na dhyānapāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:389_0: śakra āha: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā paripūryate? kathaṃ śīlapāramitā paripūryate? kathaṃ kṣāntipāramitā (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:389_1: 110) paripūryate? kathaṃ vīryapāramitā paripūryate? kathaṃ dhyānapāramitā paripūryate? kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā paripūryate?
S06psp_2-3u:390_0: bhagavān āha: iha kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānan dadan na dāyakam upalabhate na pratigrāhakam upalabhate na deyam upalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:390_1: iyam ucyate dānapāramitā. na śilam upalabhate na śīlavantaṃ na sattvam upalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:390_2: iyam ucyate śīlapāramitā. na kṣāntim upalabhate na kṣamyaṃ na kṣamiṇam upalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:390_3: iyam ucyate kṣāntipāramitā. na vīryam upalabhate na kāyaṃ na cittam upalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:390_4: iyam ucyate vīryapāramitā. na dhyānam upalabhate na dhyāyinaṃ na dhyātavyam upalabhate,
S06psp_2-3u:390_5: iyam ucyate dhyānapāramitā. na prajñām upalabhate na prajñāvantaṃ na prajñeyam upalabhate yeṣām arthāya bhāvayati,
S06psp_2-3u:390_6: iyam ucyate prajñāpāramitā. evaṃ carataḥ kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā paripūryate,
S06psp_2-3u:390_7: śīlapāramitā paripūryate kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate vīryapāramitā paripūryate dhyānapāramitā paripūryate prajñāpāramitā paripūryate.
S06psp_2-3u:390_8: evaṃ hi kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā anupalambheneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sārthā savyañjanopadeṣṭavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:390_9: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitā anupalambheneyaṃ sārthā savyañjanopadeṣṭavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:390_10: tat kasya hetor? bhaviṣyanti kauśikānāgate 'dhvani kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca te prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:390_11_0: tatra kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitasya
S06psp_2-3u:390_11_1: prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāśravaṇena vināśayiṣyanti teṣām apīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sārthā
S06psp_2-3u:391_0: śakra āha: katamā sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikā?
S06psp_2-3u:392_0: bhagavān āha: iha kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyāma iti prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_1: tatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikā rūpam anityam ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_3: evaṃ copadekṣyanti ya evaṃ ca carati sa carati prajñāpāramitāyām iti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_4: yeṣām upadekṣyanti kulaputrāṇāṃ vā kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā te rūpam anityam iti gaveṣiṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_5: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam anityam iti gaveṣiṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_9: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'nityam ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_11: evaṃ śabdā gandhā rasāḥ spraṣṭavyā dharmā anityā ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_16: śrotradhātuṃ ghrāṇadhātuṃ jihvādhātuṃ kāyadhātuṃ manodhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_19: gandhadhātuṃ rasadhātuṃ spraṣṭavyadhātuṃ dharmadhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_21: śrotravijñānadhātuṃ ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ jihvāvijñānadhātuṃ kāyavijñānadhātuṃ manovijñānadhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_23: śrotrasaṃsparśadhātuṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśadhātuṃ jihvāsaṃsparśadhātuṃ kāyasaṃsparśadhātuṃ manaḥsaṃsparśadhātum anitya ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_26: rūpaṃ duḥkham anityam anātmety aśubham ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_27: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ duḥkham anityam anātmety aśubham ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_28: pṛthivīdhātuṃ duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_29: abdhātuṃ tejodhātuṃ vāyudhātum ākāśadhātuṃ vijñānadhātuṃ duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_30: rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmā duḥkhā iti anātmāna ity aśubhā ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_31: cakṣur duḥkham ity anātmety aśubham ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_32: śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano duḥkham ity anātmety aśubham ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_33: rūpadhātuṃ śabdadhātuṃ gandhadhātuṃ rasadhātuṃ spraṣṭavyadhātuṃ dharmadhātuṃ duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_34: cakṣurdhātuṃ duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_35: śrotradhātuṃ ghrāṇadhātuṃ jihvādhātuṃ kāyadhātuṃ manodhātuṃ duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_36: cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:392_37: śrotravijñānadhātuṃ ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ jihvāvijñānadhātuṃ kāyavijñānadhātuṃ manovijñānadhātuṃ duḥkha ity anātmety aśubha ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_38: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśadhātuṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā duḥkhety anātmikety aśubhety upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_40: 112) aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ te prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_41: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāprativarṇikāṃ vīryapāramitāprativarṇikāṃ kṣāntipāramitāprativarṇikāṃ śīlapāramitāprativarṇikāṃ dānapāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_42: evaṃ rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam anityaṃ duḥkham anātmāśubham ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_43: yāvac cakṣū rūpaṃ cakṣurvijñānadhātum anityo duḥkho 'nātmāśubha ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_44: evaṃ yāvac chrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānadhātum anityo duḥkho 'nātmāśubha ity upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_46: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitā anityā duḥkhānātmāśubhety upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_47: evam apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr anityā duḥkhānātmānośubhā ity upadekṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:392_48: prajñāpārmitāyāṃ carantaḥ. evam upadekṣyanti smṛtyupasthānāny anityāni duḥkhāny anātmāny aśubhānīty upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:392_49_1: ity upadekṣyanti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto yāvat sarvākārajñatām anityā duḥkhānātmāśubhety
S06psp_2-3u:392_50: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
S06psp_2-3u:393_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā prajñāpāramitām upadiśanta evam upadekṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:393_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sa tvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayamānaḥ prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi yāvad daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi.
S06psp_2-3u:393_2: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ bhāvayamānaḥ prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi yāvad daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi.
S06psp_2-3u:393_3: tac ca nimittayogenopalambhayogena sarvākārasaṃjñayā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:394_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā evam upadekṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:394_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sa tvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayamānaḥ śrāvakabhūmiṃ samatikramiṣyasi,
S06psp_2-3u:395_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā teṣāṃ mahāyānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ vā kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitām upadiśanta evam upadekṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:395_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sa tvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayamāno bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramiṣyasi,
S06psp_2-3u:396_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā prajñāpāramitām upadiśamānā evam upadekṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:396_1_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sa tvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayamāno 'nutpattikadharmakṣāntiṃ
S06psp_2-3u:396_1_1: pratilapsyase sa tvam anutpattikadharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabhya bodhisattvābhijñāsu sthāsyasi
S06psp_2-3u:396_1_2: sa tvam abhijñāsu sthitvā buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyasi buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:396_2: evam upadekṣyanti. evam upadiśamānāḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:397_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ vā kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:397_1: yaḥ kulaputraḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśo manasikariṣyati so 'saṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:397_2: evaṃ copadiśamānāḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:398_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇām upadekṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:398_1_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:398_1_1: yat kuśalamūlaṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:398_1_2: tat sarvam anumodya ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛtyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmaya.
S06psp_2-3u:398_2: evam upadiśamānāḥ kauśika te kulaputra vā kuladuhitaro vā prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:399_0: śakra āha: katham upadiśantas te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ vā kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti?
S06psp_2-3u:400_0: bhagavān āha: iha kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:400_1: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayamāno rūpam anityato mā drākṣīs.
S06psp_2-3u:400_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? rūpaṃ rūpasvabhāvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:400_5: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra rūpan na nityam iti vā anityam iti vā vyapadiśyate.
S06psp_2-3u:400_6: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi rūpam eva tatra na saṃvidyate.
S06psp_2-3u:400_7: kuto nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati? evaṃ copadiśantas te kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:400_8: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam anityato mā drākṣīs.
S06psp_2-3u:400_9: tat kasya hetor? vijñānaṃ vijñānasvabhāvena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:400_12: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra vijñānaṃ na nityam iti vā anityam iti vā vyapadiśyate.
S06psp_2-3u:400_13: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi vijñānam eva tatra na saṃvidyate.
S06psp_2-3u:400_14: kuto nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati? evam upadiśantas te kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:400_15_1: sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu satyeṣv aṣṭavimokṣeṣu
S06psp_2-3u:400_15_3: ṣaṭsv abhijñāsu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv
S06psp_2-3u:400_16: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra sarvajñatām anityato drākṣīs.
S06psp_2-3u:400_17: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi sarvajñatā sarvajñatāsvabhāvena śūnyā,
S06psp_2-3u:400_20: yā prajñāpāramitā na tatra sarvajñatāyā nityatā vā anityatā vā vyapadiśyate.
S06psp_2-3u:400_21: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi sarvajñataiva na saṃvidyate.
S06psp_2-3u:400_22: kutaḥ punar nityatā vā anityatā vā bhaviṣyati? evaṃ copadiśantaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:400_23: kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:401_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā teṣāṃ mahāyānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ vā kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā evaṃ na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:401_1: (PSP_2-3:115) ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca tvaṃ kaṃcid dharmaṃ drākṣīḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:401_3: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na sa dharmaḥ saṃvidyate yo dharmo draṣṭavyo yatra vā pratiṣṭhātavyaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:401_4: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi kauśika sarvadharmā svabhāvena śūnyāḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:401_5: yaś ca dharmaḥ svabhāvena śūnyaḥ so 'bhāvo,
S06psp_2-3u:401_7: yā prajñāpāramitā sā na kasyacid dharmasyāyuhalaṃ vā niryūhalaṃ vā utpādo vā nirodho vā ucchedo vā śaśvato vā ekārthatā vā nānārthatā vā āgamo vā nirgamo vā.
S06psp_2-3u:401_8: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:401_9: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā artho vyapadeṣṭavyaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:401_10: evam upadiśan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:401_11: na tv eva te pūrvakāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca.
S06psp_2-3u:402_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika ye jāmbudvīpakāḥ sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet.
S06psp_2-3u:402_1: tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_2-3u:403_0: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06psp_2-3u:404_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_2-3u:404_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo naikaiḥ paryāyaiḥ kathayiṣyati deśayiṣyati vibhāvayiṣyati uttānīkariṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:404_2: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīṣva paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśo manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva.
S06psp_2-3u:404_3: tat kasya hetor? ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannaś ca srotaāpattiphalaṃ ca prabhāvyate.
S06psp_2-3u:404_4: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbudvīpakāḥ sarvasattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale vinītās,
S06psp_2-3u:404_6: tiṣṭhantu sāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale vinītās,

S06psp_2-3u:431_2: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya punar anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu sarvasattvānāṃ damanāya śamanāya parinirvāṇāya anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:432_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:432_1: yat punar ayaṃ maitreya bodhisattva ye te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśy asaṃkhyeyāprameyāparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu,
S06psp_2-3u:432_3_0: ekaikasyāṃ diśi yāvad asaṃkhyeyāprameyāparimāṇā buddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtās teṣāṃ

S06psp_2-3u:432_9: yaś ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:432_10: yā ca hitaiṣitā, yā ca mahāmaitrī, yā ca mahākaruṇā, aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāś ca buddhadharmā,

S06psp_2-3u:432_12_0: ye ca tatra dharmadeśanāyāḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptā anāgāmiphalaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:432_12_1: prāptā arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāntās teṣāṃ
