S06psp_2-3u:432_13_1: sarvam abhisaṃkṣipyāgrayā anumodanayā jyeṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā uttamayā
S06psp_2-3u:432_14_1: kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher āhārakaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:433_0: yat punar ayaṃ māhāyānika evaṃ tathā cittaṃ pariṇāmayati yair ārambaṇair yair vastubhis tac cittam utpāditam,
S06psp_2-3u:433_1: api nu tāni vastūni tāny ārambaṇāni tathā saṃvidyante tathopalabhyante yathā tair mahāyānikaiḥ kulaputrair nimittīkṛtāni?
S06psp_2-3u:434_0: maitreya āha: na tāni bhadanta subhūte vastūni,
S06psp_2-3u:434_1: na tāny ārambaṇāni tathopalabhyante yathā tair mahāyānikaiḥ kulaputrair nimittīkṛtyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitām.
S06psp_2-3u:435_0_0: subhūtir āha: yadi tāvad asaṃvidyamānair vastubhir asaṃvidyamānair ārambaṇais te
S06psp_2-3u:435_0_1: buddhā bhagavanto nimittīkṛtās tadā ye te daśasu dikṣu sarvadiglokadhātuprasareṣu
S06psp_2-3u:435_0_2: tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti teṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni prathamacittotpādam upādāya
S06psp_2-3u:435_0_3: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
S06psp_2-3u:435_4: yāni cāśaikṣāṇy anāsravāṇi kuśalamūlāni tāni sarvāṇy abhisaṃkṣipyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitāni ānimittayogena mā cāsya saṃjñāviparyāso 'bhūt.
S06psp_2-3u:435_5: anitye nityam iti saṃjñāviparyāsaś cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso 'bhūt.

S06psp_2-3u:436_1_0: tathā āryasatyāni tathā adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā tathā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni
S06psp_2-3u:436_1_1: tathā aṣṭavimokṣās tathā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayas tathā ṣaḍabhijñās tathā sarvasamādhayas
S06psp_2-3u:436_1_2: tathā sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni tathā daśatathāgatabalāni tathā vaiśāradyāni tathā pratisaṃvidas
S06psp_2-3u:437_0_0: yadi tāvad yathaiva vastu yathārambaṇaṃ tathā bodhis tathā cittaṃ tathā rūpaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā
S06psp_2-3u:437_0_1: vijñānaṃ tathā cakṣuḥ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥ tathā adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā
S06psp_2-3u:437_0_3: tathā āryasatyāni tathā aṣṭavimokṣās tathā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayahi tathā trīṇi
S06psp_2-3u:437_0_4: vimokṣamukhāni tathā ṣaḍabhijñās tathā sarvasamādhayas tathā sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_2-3u:437_0_5: tathā daśa tathāgatabalāni tathā vaiśāradyāni tathā pratisaṃvidaḥ tathā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā
S06psp_2-3u:438_0_0: tatra katamad vastu? katamad ārambaṇaṃ? katamā bodhiḥ? katamac cittaṃ? katamāni kuśalamūlāni?
S06psp_2-3u:438_0_1: katamat tad anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu yad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati?
S06psp_2-3u:439_0: maitreya āha: saced bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritā abhaviṣyan,
S06psp_2-3u:439_5_0: na te tāni vastūni na tāny ārambaṇāni na tān buddhān bhagavato na tāni kuśalamūlāni
S06psp_2-3u:439_5_1: na tāny anumodanāsahagatāni puṇyakriyāvastūni nimittikṛtyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06psp_2-3u:440_0_0: api tu khalu punas tathā pariṇāmayiṣyanti yathā na dvayayogena nādvayayogena na nimittayogena
S06psp_2-3u:440_0_1: nānimittayogena nopalambhayogena nānupalambhayogena na saṃkleśayogena na vyavadānayogena
S06psp_2-3u:441_0: sacet punar ete bodhisattvāḥ na ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitā abhaviṣyan,
S06psp_2-3u:441_1: na buddhaparyupāsitā nāvaropitakuśalamūlā na kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītā na svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitā abhaviṣyan,
S06psp_2-3u:441_2: tāni vastūni tāny ārambaṇāni tāni kuśalamūlāni tān anumodanāsahagatāṃś cittotpādān nimittīkṛtyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayiṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:442_0: na khalu punar iyaṃ bhadanta subhūte prajñāpāramitā evam upadiṣṭā navayānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:442_1_0: evaṃ dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitā adhyātmaśūnyatā
S06psp_2-3u:442_1_1: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyataivam upadiṣṭā navayānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

S06psp_2-3u:444_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:444_1: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tāni kuśalamūlāny.

S06psp_2-3u:461_1: na pariṇāmayati tāni kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,

S06psp_2-3u:462_2: evaṃ ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso bhavati na cittaviparyāso bhavati na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:463_0: maitreya āha: kathaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nimittīkaroti pariṇāmayati ca?

S06psp_2-3u:466_0: subhūtir āha: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evaṃ vyupaparīkṣitavyaṃ,

S06psp_2-3u:474_3: tat kasya hetor? na hi tasya svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate.
S06psp_2-3u:474_4: yasya ca svabhāvo na saṃvidyate so 'bhāvo.
S06psp_2-3u:474_6: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ dhātava āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāny,
S06psp_2-3u:474_7: evaṃ dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:474_8: evaṃ adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06psp_2-3u:474_9_0: evaṃ yāvat saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo
S06psp_2-3u:474_9_2: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvajñatā
S06psp_2-3u:474_9_3: asaṃpramuṣitadharmatā sadopekṣāvihāritā na kāmadhātuparyāpannā na rūpadhātuparyāpannā
S06psp_2-3u:474_10: yā cāparyāpannā na sātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā na sā śakyā nimittayogena na copalambhayogena vā pariṇāmayitum.
S06psp_2-3u:474_11: tat kasya hetor? na hi tasyāḥ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate.
S06psp_2-3u:474_12: yo na saṃvidyate so 'bhāvo. na cābhāvo 'bhāvena śakyaḥ pariṇāmayitum.
S06psp_2-3u:474_13: evaṃ hi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāmo nirviṣo bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:475_0_0: yaḥ punar mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā nimittayogena copalambhayogena
S06psp_2-3u:475_0_1: ca tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayati tāni mithyā pariṇāmayati na ca mithyā pariṇāmaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:475_1: yaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ pariṇāmaṃ na varṇayanti sa tena pariṇāmayati.
S06psp_2-3u:475_2: na dānapāramitāyāṃ pariṇāmayati na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pariṇāmayati.
S06psp_2-3u:475_5_0: nādhyātmaśūnyatāṃ na bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ na yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:475_5_2: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni nābhijñā na daśatathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido
S06psp_2-3u:475_8: na sattvān paripācayiṣyati. (PSP_2-3:136) yo na buddhakṣetrāṃ pariśodhayiṣyati na sattvān paripācayiṣyati sa nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06psp_2-3u:475_9: tat kasya hetos? tathā hy asya pariṇāmaḥ saviṣaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:476_0: punar aparaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:476_2: anayā ca dharmatayā tat kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayitavyam ity,
S06psp_2-3u:476_3: evaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatīti, tathāham api tayā dharmatayā pariṇāmayāmy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
S06psp_2-3u:477_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa:
S06psp_2-3u:477_1: sādhu sādhu subhūte sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ subhūte yas tvam eva bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pariṇāmanāskandham upadiśasi,
S06psp_2-3u:478_0: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ lābhino bhaveyuś,
S06psp_2-3u:478_1: caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pañcānām abhijñānāṃ lābhino bhaveyuḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:478_2: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte api nu te sattvās tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:479_0: subhūtir āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06psp_2-3u:480_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutataṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06psp_2-3u:480_2_0: evaṃ hi subhūte tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā kuśalamulapariṇāmo 'gra ākhyāyate
S06psp_2-3u:480_2_1: jyeṣṭha ākhyāyate śreṣṭha ākhyāyate vara ākhyāyate pravara ākhyāyate praṇīta ākhyāyate
S06psp_2-3u:480_2_2: uttama ākhyāyate anuttama ākhyāyate niruttama ākhyāyate iti mṛdumahāpuṇyodayapariṇāmaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:481_0: punar aparaṃ suhbute yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve srotaāpannā bhaveyuḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:481_2: tān sarvān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvajjīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayec cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārais.
S06psp_2-3u:481_3: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_2-3u:482_0: subhūtir āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06psp_2-3u:483_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06psp_2-3u:484_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve pratyekabuddhā bhaveyus,
S06psp_2-3u:484_1: tān sarvān pratyekabuddhān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvajjīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayec cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārais.
S06psp_2-3u:484_2: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_2-3u:485_0: subhūtir āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06psp_2-3u:486_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06psp_2-3u:487_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃpratiṣṭheran,
S06psp_2-3u:487_1_0: tatra ye pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās te sarva ekaikaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:487_1_2: satkuryur gurukuryur mānayeyuḥ pūjayeyuḥ sarvasukhopadhānair upatiṣṭheyur,
S06psp_2-3u:487_2_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣūrdhvam adho diśi gaṅgānadīvālkopameṣu
S06psp_2-3u:487_2_1: lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te sarva ekaikaṃ bodhisattvaṃ gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃś
S06psp_2-3u:487_3: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte api nu te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:488_0: subhūtir āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata. aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam aparimāṇaṃ bhagavann upamāpi na sukarā kartuṃ tasya puṇyakriyāvastunaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:488_1: saced bhagavaṃs tat puṇyakriyāvastu rūpi bhavet,
S06psp_2-3u:489_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:489_1: sādhu sādhu subhūte sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ subhūte yas tvam evaṃ bravīṣi.
S06psp_2-3u:489_2: ataḥ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06psp_2-3u:489_3: ya evaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ nirupalepapariṇāmanayānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayed.
S06psp_2-3u:489_4: evaṃ subhūte tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā ayaṃ kuśalamulapariṇāmo 'gra ākhyāyate śreṣṭha ākhyāyate jyeṣṭha ākhyāyate vara ākhyāyate pravara ākhyāyate (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:489_5: 138) praṇīta ākhyāyate uttama ākhyāyate anuttama ākhyāte niruttama ākhyāyate.
S06psp_2-3u:489_6_0: tasya subhūte nirupalepapariṇāmanāpuṇyaskandhasyāsau pūrvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīm
S06psp_2-3u:489_6_1: api kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm
S06psp_2-3u:489_6_2: api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭiniyutaśatasahasratamīm api
S06psp_2-3u:489_6_3: saṃkhyam api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy aupamyam apy upaniśām apy upaniṣadam
S06psp_2-3u:489_7: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś copalambhasaṃjñino ye daśakuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatāś caturdhyānacaturapramāṇacaturārūpyasamāpattipañcābhijñāsamanvāgatās.
S06psp_2-3u:489_8_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś copalambhasaṃjñinas tān sarvasattvān
S06psp_2-3u:489_8_1: srotaāpannabhūtān yāvad arhattvabhūtān sarvasattvān pratyekabuddhabhūtān satkuryur
S06psp_2-3u:489_9: tathā hi sa tān aupalambhikān bodhisattvān satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet.
S06psp_2-3u:490_0: atha khalu catvāro mahārājānaś cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ ca devānāṃ viṃśatidevaputrasahasrāṇi prāñjalībhūtāni bhagavantaṃ namasyanti sma.
S06psp_2-3u:490_1_0: evaṃ cāhur: mahāpariṇāmo batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yo 'yam upāyakauśalenānupalambhayogena
S06psp_2-3u:490_1_1: nirupalepayogenānimittayogena tāni kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
S06psp_2-3u:490_2: tathā pariṇāmayati yathā na dvayam upaiti nādvayam.
S06psp_2-3u:491_0_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indras trāyastriṃśair devaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ divyapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhir
S06psp_2-3u:491_1_0: evaṃ ca vācam abhāṣata: mahāpariṇāmo batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_2-3u:491_2: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathā na dvayam upaiti nādvayam.
S06psp_2-3u:492_0: atha khalu suyāmo devaputraḥ saṃtuṣito nirmāṇaratiḥ paranirmitavaśavartī ca devaputro 'nekair devaputraśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:492_1_0: mahāpariṇāmo batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yo 'yam upāyakauśalenānupalambhayogena
S06psp_2-3u:492_1_1: nirupalepayogenānimittayogena tāni kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
S06psp_2-3u:493_0: atha khalu brahmapārṣadyānāṃ devānām anekāni devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāny upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya śabdam akārṣuḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:493_1_0: ghoṣam udīrayāmāsuḥ: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yathāpi nāma bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitayā
S06psp_2-3u:493_1_1: parigṛhītā upāyakauśalyena ca teṣāṃ paurvakāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:493_1_2: kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca aupalambhikānāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāny abhibhavanti.
S06psp_2-3u:493_2_0: evaṃ brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā
S06psp_2-3u:493_2_1: apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā vṛhatphalāḥ śuddhāvāsāḥ sudṛśāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:493_3: anekair devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sardhāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmann upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya śabdam akārṣuḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:493_4: ghoṣam udīrayāmāsuh: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yathāpi nāma bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītā,
S06psp_2-3u:493_5: upāyakauśalena ca teṣāṃ paurvakānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca aupalambhikānāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāny abhibhavanti.
S06psp_2-3u:494_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃś cāturmahārājakāyikān devaputrān yāvad akaniṣṭhān devaputrān āmantrayāmāsa:
S06psp_2-3u:494_1: yadi devaputrā ye trisāharamahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā bhaveyus,
S06psp_2-3u:494_2_0: te sarve 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:494_2_1: sapratyekabuddhānāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad anuttarāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:494_2_2: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvac ca nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:494_2_3: yāvat saddharmasthitir etasminn antare teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ teṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:494_2_4: teṣāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ tato 'nyeṣāṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ yat kuśalamūlaṃ dānapāramitā
S06psp_2-3u:494_2_7: 'nye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmās tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipyānumodyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
S06psp_2-3u:494_3_0: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthito bhavet
S06psp_2-3u:494_4_0: 140) yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
S06psp_2-3u:494_4_1: parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvat saddharmasthitir etasminn antare teṣāṃ sarveṣām anyeṣāṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:494_4_2: yat kuśalamūlaṃ dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramita dhyānapāramitā
S06psp_2-3u:494_4_3: prajñāpāramitā yāvad aparimāṇā buddhadharmās tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā
S06psp_2-3u:494_6: evaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā teṣāṃ pūrvakānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇām antikād bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_2-3u:494_7: idaṃ ca kuśalamūlaṃ tasya pūrvakasya kuśalamūlasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamate.
S06psp_2-3u:494_8: idaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānupalambhayogena pariṇāmitam agram ākhyāyate yāvad niruttaram ākhyāyate.
S06psp_2-3u:495_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:495_1: yo bhagavaṃs tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā sa ca kuśalamūlānumodanāpariṇāmanāpuṇyaskandha ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛto 'grayānumodanayā numoditaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:495_2: kathaṃ bhagavann agrānumodanā bhavati yāvan niruttarānumodanā bhavati?
S06psp_2-3u:496_0_0: bhagavān āha: yadā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:496_0_1: arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sapratyekabuddhānām anyeṣāṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:496_0_2: kuśalān dharmān na gṛhṇāti na muñcati na manyate nāvamanyate nopalabhate.
S06psp_2-3u:496_1: evaṃ cāsya bhavati naivātra kaścid dharma utpadyate na nirudhyate na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate,
S06psp_2-3u:496_2: na ca teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ hānir na vṛddhir nāgamo na nirgamo na rāśir nābhāvaḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:496_3_0: etena paryāyeṇa yac caiṣām atītānāgatapratyutpannāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatāvitathatānanyatathatā
S06psp_2-3u:496_3_1: dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā tathāham anumode anumodyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
S06psp_2-3u:496_4: evam anumodamānasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyagrānumodanā bhavati yāvan niruttarānumodanā bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:496_5: asyāḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte anumodanāyā anyā yā anumodanās tāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:496_6: sarvā śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopayānti yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamante.
S06psp_2-3u:497_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:497_1_0: 141) vā teṣāṃ atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:497_1_1: saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sapratyekabuddhānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvac cānuttarāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:497_1_2: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ

S06psp_2-3u:529_20: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy upalambhasaṃjñino bodhisattvās tathā sattvājātitayā prajñāpāramitā draṣṭavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:529_22: 148) draṣṭavyā. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānājātitaḥ prajñāpāramitājātitā draṣṭavyā yāvad buddhājātitaḥ prajñāpāramitājātitā draṣṭavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:529_25: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānāsvabhāvatayā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvatā draṣṭayyā yāvad buddhāsvabhāvatayā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvatā draṣṭavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:529_27: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānābhāvatayā prajñāpāramitābhāvatā veditavyā yāvad buddhābhāvatayā prajñāpāramitābhāvatā veditavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:529_30: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyatā veditavyā yāvad buddhaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitā śūnyata veditavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:529_33: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānānimittatayāpraṇihitatayā prajñāpāramitānimittatāpraṇihitatā yāvad buddhānimittatayāpraṇihitatayā prajñāpāramitānimittatāpraṇihitatā.
S06psp_2-3u:529_39: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānānabhisaṃbodhanatayā prajñāpāramitānabhisaṃbodhanatā veditvayā yāvad buddhānabhisaṃbodhanatayā prajñāpāramitānabhisaṃbodhanatā veditavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:529_42: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānabalāsamanvāgatayā prajñāpāramitā balāsamanvāgatatā veditavyā yāvad buddhabalāsamanvāgatatayā prajñāpāramitā balāsamanvāgatatā vedjtavyā.
S06psp_2-3u:529_43: anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:530_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:530_1: yo 'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām adhimokṣyate,
S06psp_2-3u:530_2_0: kutaś cyutvā sa ihāgato bhaviṣyati? kiyaccirasaṃprasthitaḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
S06psp_2-3u:530_2_1: vā abhūd anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? kiyanto vānena tathāgatāḥ paryupāsitāḥ? kiyacciraṃ
S06psp_2-3u:530_3_0: 149) sa dānapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ? kiyacciraṃ śīlapāramitāṃ caritaḥ? kiyacciraṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:530_3_1: caritaḥ? kiyacciraṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ? kiyacciraṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ?
S06psp_2-3u:530_3_2: kiyacciraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carito ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām arthataś ca nayataś cādhimokṣyate?
S06psp_2-3u:531_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:531_1: sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśasu dikṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paryupāsyehāgata ihopapanno bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:532_0: yaḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃkhyeyāny aprameyāṇi kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi samudāgato 'bhūd anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_2-3u:532_1_0: sa prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:532_1_1: carito vīryapāramitāyāṃ carito dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:532_2: sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā dṛṣṭayā śrutayā vā śāstā mayā dṛṣṭa iti cittam utpādayiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:532_3: śāstā mayā śruta iti cittam utpādayiṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:532_4: sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ prajñāpāramitām arthataś ca nayataś cādhigamiṣyaty animittādvayānupalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:533_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:533_1: śakyā punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā draṣṭuṃ vā śrotuṃ vā?
S06psp_2-3u:534_0: bhagavān āha: no hīdaṃ subhūte na hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śrotāro draṣṭāro na prajñāpāramitāṃ te paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādaya.
S06psp_2-3u:534_1: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ te na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādāya.
S06psp_2-3u:534_2: adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādāya.
S06psp_2-3u:534_3: smṛtyupasthānāni na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādāya.
S06psp_2-3u:534_4: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādāya.
S06psp_2-3u:534_5_1: sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ
S06psp_2-3u:534_5_2: pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti.
S06psp_2-3u:534_6: buddhabodhiṃ na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti dharmajaḍatām upādāya.
S06psp_2-3u:535_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:535_1: kiyacciraṃ caritaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpatsyate?
S06psp_2-3u:536_1: syāt subhūte paryāyo yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate.
S06psp_2-3u:536_2: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate.
S06psp_2-3u:536_3: tac copāyakauśalena na ca kaṃcid dharmaṃ pratikṣipati yathā nopacayaṃ paśyati nāpacayaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:536_4: na jātu ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir virahito bhavati na buddhair bhagavadbhir,
S06psp_2-3u:536_5: yaiś ca pūjāviśeṣair ākāṅkṣet tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tasya te pūjāviśeṣāḥ sahacittotpādenaiva saṃṛdhyante.
S06psp_2-3u:536_8: na ca jātu virahito bhavati abhijñābhir.
S06psp_2-3u:536_9: na ca kenacit kleśena sārdhaṃ saṃvasati.
S06psp_2-3u:536_10: na śrāvakacittena na pratyekabuddhacittena sārdhaṃ saṃvasati.
S06psp_2-3u:536_11: buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati sattvāṃś ca paripācayan buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayan.
S06psp_2-3u:536_12: ayaṃ subhūte bobhisattvo mahāsattvo yo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yogam āpatsyate.
S06psp_2-3u:537_0_0: santi punaḥ subhūte mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca yair bahūni buddhaśatāni
S06psp_2-3u:537_0_1: bahūni buddhasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
S06psp_2-3u:537_1: tebhyaś cāntike śikṣamāṇair dānāni dattāni bhavanti,
S06psp_2-3u:537_2: śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ kṣāntir bhāvitā vīryam ārabdhaṃ dhyānam āsevitaṃ prajñā bhāvitā bhavati sā copalambhayogena.
S06psp_2-3u:537_4: te punaḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāgauravatayāsyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād apakramiṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:537_5: ihaiva te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca mahāyānikāḥ saṃnipatitā ye gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām apakramiṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:537_6: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca pūrvānte 'pi gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām apakrāntā,
S06psp_2-3u:537_7: etarhy api gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām apakrāmānti.
S06psp_2-3u:537_8: na kāyena na cittena samagrīn dāsyanti duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyaṃ karmopaceṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:537_9: te tena dauṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtenopacitena imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ pratyākhyāsyanti,
S06psp_2-3u:537_10: taiḥ pratyākhyāya atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatāpratyākhyātā bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:537_11: te tena sarvajñatāpratyākhyānena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtenopacitena bahūni varṣāṇi bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:537_13: teṣāṃ mahānirayān mahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanī vā apsaṃvartanī vā vāyusaṃvartanī vā prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:537_14: te tāsu saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhātāsv anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye mahānirayās teṣu prakṣepsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:537_15: te tatropapannāḥ samānāḥ, mahānirayān mahānirayaṃ saṃkramiṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:537_16: teṣāṃ mahānirayān mahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ punar eva saṃvartanīyaḥ prādurbhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:537_17: tāsu saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsu pūrvasyāṃ diśi prakṣepsyante,
S06psp_2-3u:537_18: dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣūrdhvam adho diśi yo mahānirayās teṣu prakṣepsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:537_19: tebhyo 'pi punaḥ saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsv anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye mahānirayās teṣu prakṣepsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:537_20: teṣu punar api tebhyo lokadhātubhyaḥ saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsu tebhyo mahānirayebhaś cyutās tena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇākṣīṇena punar eva ihopapatsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:537_21: te punar eva mahānirayān mahānirayaṃ saṃkramiṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:537_22: te teṣu mahānirayeṣūpapannā bahūni tīvrāṇi mahākaṭukāni mahānirayaduḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:537_23: tāvad eva te tāni nirayaduḥkhāṃ pratyanubhaviṣyanti yāvat punar eva saṃvartanīyaḥ prādurbhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:537_24: saṃvartanīṣu prādurbhūtāsv itaś cyutā anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu punar eva mahānirayeṣūpapatsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:537_25: evaṃ samantāt punar api daśasu dikṣu tiryagyoniṣūpapatsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:537_26: punar eva daśasu dikṣu yamalokeṣūpapannā mahātīvrāṃ mahākaṭukāṃ mahāduṣkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayantas tat karma kṣepayiṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:537_27: te bahuduḥkhavedanīyaṃ karma kṣepayitvā kadācit karhicit mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilapsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:537_28: te yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatra jātyandhā bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:537_29: jātyandhakuleṣūpapatsyante. caṇḍālakuleṣu vā puṣkasakuleṣu vā śākunikuleṣu vā sukarikuleṣu vā aurabhikakuleṣu vā nīceṣu vā kutsiteṣu vā kuleṣu vā nīcavṛttisu vā upapatsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:537_30_0: te teṣūpapannā andhā vā bhaviṣyanti kāṇā vā ajihvā vā ahastā vā apādā vā akarṇakā
S06psp_2-3u:537_30_1: vā anāsikā vā yatra buddhaśabdaṃ na śroṣyanti na dharmaśabdaṃ na saṃghaśabdaṃ na
S06psp_2-3u:537_30_2: bodhisattvaśabdaṃ na pratyekabuddhaśabdaṃ śroṣyanti nārhacchabdaṃ śroṣyanti te tenaiva
S06psp_2-3u:538_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:538_1: pañca bhagavann ānantaryāṇy asya dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyasya karmaṇaḥ kṛtasyopacitasya prativarṇikā api na bhavanti?
S06psp_2-3u:539_0: bhagavān āha: prativarṇiketi śāriputra na vaktavyāsya dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyakarmaṇaḥ kṛtasyopacitasya.
S06psp_2-3u:539_2: nātra śikṣitavyaṃ naiṣa dharmo naiṣa vinayo naitac (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:539_3: 152) chāstuḥ śāsanaṃ naitat tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair bhāṣitam iti bhāṣyante,
S06psp_2-3u:539_6: te svasaṃtānāny upahatya parasaṃtānāny upahantavyāni maṃsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:539_7: te svasaṃtānaṃ saviṣaṃ kṛtvā parasaṃtānāny api saviṣāṇi kariṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:539_8: te svayaṃ naṣṭāḥ. parān api nāśayiṣyanti. svayaṃ ca gambhīrāṃ prajñāramitām ajānanto 'buddhyamānāḥ prativahitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
S06psp_2-3u:539_10: nāhaṃ śāriputra teṣāṃ pudgalānāṃ śravaṇam apy abhyanujānāmi kaḥ punar vādo darśanaṃ kuta eva sthānaṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:539_11: tat kasya hetor? dharmadūṣakā hi te śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ kaśaṃbakajātīyāḥ kṛṣṇā hi jātayaḥ śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:539_12: teṣāṃ khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathārūpāṇāṃ pudgalānāṃ ye śrotavyaṃ śraddhātavyaṃ maṃsyante te 'nayena vyasanam āpatsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:539_13: yaś cemāṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitāṃ dūṣayiṣyati dharmadūṣakaḥ sa pudgalo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:540_0: śāriputra āha: na khalu punar bhagavaṃs tasya dharmadūṣakasya pudgalasya bhagavatā tatropapannasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam ākhyātam.
S06psp_2-3u:541_0: bhagavān āha: tiṣṭhatu śāriputra tasya dharmadūṣakasya pudgalasya tatropapannasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam.
S06psp_2-3u:541_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? mā tasya dharmadūṣakasya pudgalasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ śrutvā uṣṇaṃ rudhiraṃ mukhād āgacchet,
S06psp_2-3u:541_4: ucchoṣyed vā mlāyed vā nīlo vā harito vā lūno vā yāvad idaṃ tasya dharmadūṣakasya pudgalasya dṛśasyātmabhāvapratilābhasya pramāṇam iti,
S06psp_2-3u:541_6: na bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyāvakāśaṃ karotīdaṃ tasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti.
S06psp_2-3u:542_0_0: śāriputra āha: ākhyātu bhagavān paścimāyā janatāyā ālokāḥ kṛto bhaviṣyaty anena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena
S06psp_2-3u:542_0_1: karmaṇā kṛtenopacitena dharmadūṣakāḥ pudgalā īdṛśam ātmabhāvaṃ parigrahīṣyantīti.
S06psp_2-3u:543_0: bhagavān āha: evam eva śāriputra paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyaty anenāsau dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtenopacitena mahānirayeṣu duḥkham anubhaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:543_1: yā etasyaiva duḥkhasyāpramāṇatā bahutaraṃ ceyacciraṃ duḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyantīti,
S06psp_2-3u:543_2: eṣa eva śuklāṃśikasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā tebhyo dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyebhyaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:543_4: te jivitahetor api dharmaṃ na pratikṣepsyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:543_5: mā bhūd asmākam īdṛśair duḥkhaiḥ samavadhānam iti.
S06psp_2-3u:544_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:544_2_0: 153) bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā bhavitavyaṃ mā bhūd īdṛśānāṃ duḥkhānām
S06psp_2-3u:544_2_1: anubhavanam iti tathāgataṃ vā na drakṣyāma iti dharmaṃ vā na śroṣyāma iti saṃghaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:544_2_2: vā na drakṣyāma ity apagatabuddhotpādeṣu vā buddhakṣetreṣūpapatsyāmaha iti manuṣyadaridreṣu
S06psp_2-3u:544_3: anena bhagavan dharmapratikṣepavākkarmaṇā kṛtenopacitena vyasanasaṃvartanīyaṃ karmakṛtam upacitaṃ bhavati.
S06psp_2-3u:545_0_0: bhagavān āha: anena subhūte sarvadharmapratikṣepavākkarmaṇā kṛtenopacitena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:545_0_1: karma kṛtaṃ bhavaty upacitam ihaiva te subhūte mohapuruṣāḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye
S06psp_2-3u:545_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūṣayitavyāṃ maṃsyante pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyante.
S06psp_2-3u:545_2: prajñāpāramitayā subhūte dūṣitayā pratibādhitayā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhir dūṣitā pratibādhitā bhavati,

S06psp_2-3u:727_0: subhūtir āha: evam eva kauśika yo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta sa yāvad eva vighatasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt.

S06psp_2-3u:730_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:730_1_0: 177) rūpaṃ na manyate, rūpeṇa na manyate, rūpaṃ mameti na manyate, rūpe 'pi manyate.
S06psp_2-3u:730_1_1: svapnaṃ na manyate, svapnena na manyate, svapnaṃ mameti na manyate, svapne 'pi na
S06psp_2-3u:730_1_2: manyate, yāvan nirmitaṃ na manyate, nirmitena na manyate, nirmitaṃ mameti na manyate,
S06psp_2-3u:730_1_3: nirmite 'pi na manyate, vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānaṃ na manyate,
S06psp_2-3u:730_2_0: vijñānena na manyate, vijñānaṃ mameti na manyate, vijñāne 'pi na manyate. evaṃ vyastasamastāḥ
S06psp_2-3u:730_3: sarvajñatayā na manyate, sarvajñatāṃ mameti na manyate,
S06psp_2-3u:731_0_0: atha khalu buddhānubhāvena ye 'smiṃs trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
S06psp_2-3u:731_0_1: devās trāyastriṃṣā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmapārṣadyā
S06psp_2-3u:731_1: yāvac chuddhāvasakāyikā devaputrās te sarve divyāni candanacūrṇāny abhyavakīrya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma,
S06psp_2-3u:732_0: atha khalu catvāro mahārājānaḥ śakraś ca brahmāṇaś ca yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikāś ca devaputrā buddhānubhāvena buddhasahasraṃ samanvāharanti sma,
S06psp_2-3u:732_1: dharmaṃ deśayamānam ebhir evākṣarair ebhir eva nāmadheyaiḥ subhūtināmadheyair bhikṣubhir imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ paripraśnīkṛtāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:732_2: deśayamānaṃ śakrāś ca devānām indrāḥ paripraśnayantīmām eva prajñāpāramitām.
S06psp_2-3u:732_3: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām ūrdhvam adho dikṣu sarvatra buddhasahasraṃ samanvāharanti sma,
S06psp_2-3u:732_4: dharmaṃ deśayamānam ebhir evākṣarair ebhir eva nāmadheyaiḥ subhūtināmadheyair eva bhikṣubhir imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ paripraśnīkṛtāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:732_5: deśayamānaṃ sarvatra ca śakrāś ca devānām indrāḥ paripraśnayantimām eva prajñāpāramitām.
S06psp_2-3u:733_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:733_1: asminn eva subhūte pṛthivīpradeśe maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate.
S06psp_2-3u:733_2: asminn eva pṛthivīpradeśe ye 'pi te bhaviṣyantiha bhadrakalpe tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:733_3: 178) te 'py anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyante.
S06psp_2-3u:734_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:734_1: katamair bhagavann ākāraiḥ katamair liṅgaiḥ katamair nimittair maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate?
S06psp_2-3u:735_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya na rūpaṃ nityam anityaṃ veti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:735_1: evaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ nātmā nānātmā,
S06psp_2-3u:735_2: na rūpaṃ śubham aśubhaṃ veti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:735_3: na rūpaṃ baddhaṃ muktaṃ veti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:735_4: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā na vijñānaṃ nityam anityaṃ veti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:735_5: evaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ nātmā nānātmā na vijñānaṃ śubham aśubhaṃ veti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:735_6: na vijñānaṃ baddhaṃ muktaṃ veti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:735_7: na rūpam atītaṃ nānāgataṃ na pratyutpannam iti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:735_8: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam atītaṃ nānāgataṃ na pratyutpannam iti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:735_9_3: abhijñāsu daśabaleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yāvat sarvajñatā
S06psp_2-3u:735_9_4: nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpanneti evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:736_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_2-3u:736_1: kathaṃ punar bhagavan maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti?
S06psp_2-3u:737_0: bhagavān āha: rūpam atyantaviśuddham atyantaviśuddham iti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:737_1: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānam atyantaviśuddham atyantaviśuddham iti dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:739_0: bhagavān āha: rūpapariśuddhatvāt subhūte pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:740_0: subhūtir āha: tat kasya heter? bhagavan rūpasya pariśuddhatvāt pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_2-3u:740_1_0: kathaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ kathaṃ vijñānasya pariśuddhatvāt pariśuddhā
S06psp_2-3u:740_3: bhagavān āha: rūpasya subhūte notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ rūpapariśuddhir,
S06psp_2-3u:740_4: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya subhūte notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ vijñānapariśuddhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:740_5_2: abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ
S06psp_2-3u:740_5_3: buddhadharmāṇāṃ notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ buddhadharmapariśuddhiḥ,
S06psp_2-3u:740_6: sarvajñatāyā notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ sarvajñatāpariśuddhiḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:741_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte ākāśapariśuddhyā pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:742_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ punar bhagavann ākāśapariśuddhyā pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā?
S06psp_2-3u:743_0: bhagavān āha: ākāśavad rūpasya yāvat sarvajñatāyā anutpādānirodhāsaṃkleśāvyavadānapariśuddhyā pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:745_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavann ākāśanirupaletvāt pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā?
S06psp_2-3u:746_0: bhagavān āha: ākāśavad rūpasya yāvat sarvajñatāyā nirupalepatvāt pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:747_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte ākāśāgrāhyatvāt pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:748_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavann ākāśāgrāhyatvāt pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā?
S06psp_2-3u:749_0: bhagavān āha: ākāśavad rūpasya yāvat sarvajñatāyā agrāhyatvāt pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:751_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavann ākāśāvyāhāratayā pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā?
S06psp_2-3u:752_0: bhagavān āha: tadyathāpi subhūte ākāśe pratiśrutkā dvayasya śabdaḥ evam eva subhūte ākāśavad rūpasya yāvat sarvajñatāyā apravyāhāratayā pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:754_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavann ākāśāpravyāhāratayā pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā?
S06psp_2-3u:755_0: bhagavān āha: na hi subhūte ākāśasya kaścit pravyāhāraḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:755_1: evam eva subhūte rūpasya yāvat sarvajñatāyā apravyāhāratayā pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:757_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavann ākāśānupalambhatayā pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā?
S06psp_2-3u:758_0: bhagavān āha: na hi subhūte ākāśasya kaścid upalambhaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:758_1: evam eva subhūte rūpasya yāyat saryajñatāyā anupalambhatayā pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:759_0: sarvadharmāṇām anutpādānirodhatvād asaṃkleśāvyavadānatvāt subhūte pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:760_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇām anutpādānirodhatvād asaṃkleśāvyavadānatvāt pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā?
S06psp_2-3u:761_0: bhagavān āha: rūpasya yāvat sarvajñatayā atyantaviśuddhatvāt pariśudhā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:762_0: subhūtir āha: yo hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:762_2: na śrotrarogo na ghrāṇarogo na jihvārogo na kāyarogo bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:762_3: na manorogo bhaviṣyati, na hīnāṅgo bhaviṣyati, na jīrṇakāyo bhaviṣyati. nāpi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:762_4: bahūni cāsya devatāsahasrāṇi pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāni bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:762_5: dharmaśravaṇikāḥ cāturmahārājakāykā devā yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikā devāḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:762_6: aṣṭamyāṃ caturdasyāṃ pañcadasyāṃ ca mahān devatāsaṃghaḥ saṃnipatiṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:762_7: yatra saddharmabhāṇakaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyāte.
S06psp_2-3u:762_8: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇo bahutarapuṇyaṃ prasavati.
S06psp_2-3u:762_9: aprameyam asaṃkheyam aparimāṇam acintyam atulyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:763_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, aprameyam asaṃkhyeaṃ aparimāṇam acintyam atulyaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati.
S06psp_2-3u:763_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām aṣṭamyāṃ caturdasyāṃ pañcadasyāṃ ca bhāṣiṣyate tasya devaparṣadaḥ purato 'nubaddhā bhaviṣyanti.
S06psp_2-3u:763_2: tat kasya hetor? mahāratnam idaṃ subhūte yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:764_0: tatredaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāratnaṃ sevyamānaṃ nirayād mocayiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:764_1: tiryagyoner mocayiṣyati, yamalokād mocayiṣyati, manuṣyadaridrād mocayiṣyati. kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣūpapādayiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:764_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ daśakuśalāḥ karmapathā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra pratiṣṭhā yatra kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:764_11: cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇarataḥ paranirmitavasavartino devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:764_17: ābhāsvarā devāḥ prajñāyante, parīttaśubhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:764_18: apramāṇaśubhā (PSP_2-3:182) devāḥ prajñāyante, śubhakṛtsnā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:764_19: anabhrakā devāḥ prajñāyante, puṇyaprasavā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:764_22: aspṛhā devāḥ prajñayante, atapā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudṛśā devāḥ prajñāyante, sudarśanā devāḥ prajñāyante, akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante, akāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:764_27: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate, arhattvaṃ prajñāyate, pratyekabodhiḥ prajñāyate, anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prajñāyate.
S06psp_2-3u:764_28: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ catvāri dhyānāni prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:764_31_0: dānapāramitā prajñāyate, śīlapāramitā prajñāyate, kṣāntipāramitā prajñāyate, vīryapāramitā
S06psp_2-3u:764_31_1: prajñāyate, dhyānapāramitā prajñāyate, prajñāpāramitā prajñāyate, upāyakauśalapāramitā
S06psp_2-3u:764_33: balapāramitā prajñāyate, jñānapāramitā prajñāyte. smṛtyupasthānāni prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:764_35: adhyātmaśūnyatā prajñāyate, bahirdhāśūnyatā prajñāyate, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā prajñāyate yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā prajñāyate.
S06psp_2-3u:764_39: ṣaḍabhijñāḥ prajñāyante, samādhayaḥ prajāyante, sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:764_45: yāvat sarvajñatā prajñāyate, bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāyante,
S06psp_2-3u:764_46_0: trīṇi ratnāni prajñāyante, buddharatnaṃ prajñāyate, dharmaratnaṃ prajñāyate, saṃgharatnaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:764_46_1: prajñāyate. iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ evamādayo dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭās tenocyate ratnapāramiteyaṃ
S06psp_2-3u:765_0: na ca subhūte ratnapāramitāyāṃ kaścid dharma utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā parigṛhyate vā cchoryate vā.
S06psp_2-3u:765_1: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi te dharmā na saṃvidyante ye utpadyeran vā nirudhyeran vā saṃkliśyeyur vā vyavadāyeyur vā parigṛhyeyur vā cchoryeyur vā.
S06psp_2-3u:765_2: nāpy asmin prajñāpāramitāratne kaścid dharma utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā kuśalo vā akuśalo vā sāsravo vā anāsravo vā sāvadyo vā anavadyo vā saṃkleśo vā (PSP_2-3:
S06psp_2-3u:765_3: 183) niḥkleśo vā lokiko vā lokottaro vā saṃskṛto vā asaṃskṛto vā.
S06psp_2-3u:765_4: anenāpi subhūte paryāyeṇa ratnapāramiteyaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:766_1: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi te dharmā nopalabhyante yair upalipyeta,
S06psp_2-3u:767_0: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evam api na jānāti,
S06psp_2-3u:767_1: evam api na vikalpayati, evam api nopalabhate, evam api na prapañcayiṣyati, cariṣyati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ, bhāvayiṣyati prajñāpāramitāṃ,
S06psp_2-3u:767_4: buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum arcayitum apacāyituṃ buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāman sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyati,
S06psp_2-3u:767_6: anuprāpsyati sarvajñatām. iti mārge 'nvayajñānam ity ukto darśanamārgaḥ
S06psp_2-3u:768_0_0: seyaṃ punaḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasyāvāhikā na nirvāhikā na darśikā
S06psp_2-3u:768_0_1: na nidarśikā na dāyikā na cchorikā notpādikā na nirodhikā nocchedikā na śāśvatikā
S06psp_2-3u:768_0_2: naikārthikā na nānārthikā nāgamikā na nirgamikā na saṃkleśikā na viśodhikā na hānikārikā
S06psp_2-3u:768_0_3: na vṛddhikārikā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā.
S06psp_2-3u:769_0: seyaṃ punaḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na kāmadhātusamatikramikā vā sthāpikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:769_3: na dānapāramitāyā dāyikā vā na mārgasya cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:769_6: na bahirdhāśūnyatāyā nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:769_7: yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā dāyikā vā cchorikā vā.
S06psp_2-3u:769_9: na caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ nāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ na navanupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:769_10: na ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:769_11: na daśānāṃ bodhisattvabhūmīnāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:769_12: na daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:769_13: na smṛtyupasthānānāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā.
S06psp_2-3u:769_14: evaṃ na samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgānāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:769_15: na balānāṃ (PSP_2-3:184) na vaiśāradyānāṃ na pratisaṃvidāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:769_16: nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:769_17: na samādhīnāṃ na dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:769_18: na srotaāpattiphalasya dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:769_19: na sakṛdāgāmiphalasya nānāgāmiphalasya nārhattvasya na pratyekabuddhatvasya na sarvajñatāyā dāyikā vā cchorikā vā.
S06psp_2-3u:770_0: sā khalu punar iyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na buddhadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:770_1: na pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:770_2: na śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:770_3: nāpi buddhadharmāṇāṃ dāyikā vā cchorikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:770_4: na saṃskṛtadhātor dāyikā vā cchorikā vā.
S06psp_2-3u:770_5: tat kasya hetor? utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā.
S06psp_2-3u:770_6: tāṃ tathāgato 'bhisaṃbudhyate 'py abhisamety apy abhisaṃbudhyābhisamety ācaṣṭe deśayati vivṛṇoti vibhajaty uttānīkaroti saṃprakāśayati.
S06psp_2-3u:771_0: atha khalu saṃbahulāni devaputraśatasahasrāṇy upary antarīkṣe sthitvā kilikilāprakṣveḍitāny akārṣur divyāni cotpalakumudapuṇḍarīkapadmamāndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi kṣipanti sma.
S06psp_2-3u:771_1: evaṃ ca vācam abhāṣanta, dvitīyaṃ batedaṃ dharmacakrapravartanaṃ jāmbūdvīpe paśyāmaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:771_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nirdiśya mānāyāṃ tatrānekāni devaputrasahasrāṇy anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhante sma.
S06psp_2-3u:772_0: atha khalu bhagavān sthaviraṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa:
S06psp_2-3u:772_1: nedaṃ subhūte dvitiyaṃ dharmacakrapravartanaṃ nāpy ekaṃ nāpīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kasyacid dharmasya pravartanāya vā nivartanāya vā pratyupasthitā.
S06psp_2-3u:773_0: subhūtir āha: katamā bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā yad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasya pravartanāya vā nivartanāya vā pratyupasthitā?
S06psp_2-3u:774_0: bhagavān āha: prajñāpāramitā subhūte prajñāpāramitayā śūnyā.
S06psp_2-3u:774_1: evaṃ dhyānaṃ vīryaṃ kṣāntiṃ śīlaṃ dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā śūnyā,
S06psp_2-3u:774_2: adhyātmaśūnyatā adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā,
S06psp_2-3u:774_18: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ sarvajñatā sarvajñatāśūnyatayā śūnyā.
S06psp_2-3u:775_0: subhūtir āha: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_2-3u:775_2: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_2-3u:775_3: na kaṃcid dharmam abhisaṃbudhyante dharmacakraṃ pravartanti,
S06psp_2-3u:775_4: na kaṃcid dharmaṃ pravartayanti nivartayanti vā.
S06psp_2-3u:775_5: na ca taiḥ kaścid dharmaḥ saṃdṛśyate,
S06psp_2-3u:775_6: na kaścid dharmo dṛśyate. tat kasya hetos? tathā hi sarvadharmā nopalabhyante ye dharmāḥ pravartante vā nivartante vā.
S06psp_2-3u:775_7: tat kasya hetos? tathā hy atyantānabhiniviṣṭāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:775_8: na hi śūnyatā pravartikā vā nivartikā vā,
S06psp_2-3u:775_11: yā evaṃdeśanā sā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prakāśanā kathanā prajñāpanā prasthāpanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā sūcanā uttānīkaraṇaṃ saṃprakāśanā,
S06psp_2-3u:775_13: yā ca prajñāpāramitāyā deśanā na kenacid deśitā na kenacit pratīcchitā,
S06psp_2-3u:775_14: sā na kenacit sākṣātkṛtā. yā na kenacit sākṣātkṛtā na tatra kaścit parinirvṛto nāpi tayā dharmadeśanayā kaścid dakṣiṇīyaḥ kṛtaḥ.
S06psp_2-3u:775_15: iti tṛtiyaṃ sarvākārajñatādhikārasamāptidīpanam ity uktā sarvajñatā
S06psp_2-3u:776_0: āryapañcaviṃśatiśāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyāṃ sarvajñatādhikāracaryāviśeṣaparivartaḥ tṛtīyaḥ
